 Vi söker dig som trivs med att ha många kontaktytor och som har goda kommunikativa egenskaper. Vi tror också att du har goda systemkunskaper och ett stort systemintresse samt är en duktig administratör. 
 



 Företaget har kontoret placerat strax norr om Stockholm. 
   





 Välkommen att skicka in ansökan omgående!
   

 Frågar besvaras på: oskar.windolf@newr.se

title: Graduate Consultants for Cloud First at Accenture Technology
description:
*Are you ready to put your skills and abilities into practice? Come join Accenture in Stockholm, Malmö or Gothenburg in February or August 2025 and let us help you create the perfect foundation for a career within Technology consulting!*
 Tech Talent Program
   

  

 When entering Accenture Technology as a graduate consultant, you will be part of our Tech Talent Program.
   

  

  

- During the two-year Tech Talent Program, you will go through an intense learning process – with a Buddy and People Lead helping and coaching you to figure out exactly how to develop your career and skills needed to succeed.

- You will be a consultant from day one as you will be part of projects where we implement complex technology and business critical IT systems for our international clients, transforming their business.

- You will build your professional network across the organization by being part of projects, taking part in our communities and by joining our social events and parties.

 Accenture Technology Accenture Technology leverages design thinking, industry insights and the latest digital and security methodologies to help clients innovate, grow, and improve their businesses. Our expertise, capabilities and experience mean that our clients (including some of the biggest brands in the world) trust us to find the right solutions for their needs. Cloud First Accenture continues to lead in the cloud and today has a broad footprint among all the major cloud providers as well as private clouds and on-premise infrastructure. Digital and cloud technologies are changing the way our clients do business and are transforming the operating models and infrastructure at the heart of their operations. We have a clear market differentiation and leadership in New Emerging & Growth Technologies like Extended Reality, Blockchain, Application Security and leveraging our Innovation Architecture that will reflect the essence of the New Engineered Software Technologies
 **About the role**
 Whether you are a programmer guru, a digital innovator, a tech wizard, or a business problem solver, you will find an exciting career path on the cutting edge. We would love to get to know your unique blend of talents and help you explore and grow them further
   

  

*These are some of the responsibilities and tasks that you as a graduate may work with:*
- Help our customers to develop the best IT solutions by being a link between business and IT

- Work with cloud solutions like Google Cloud Platform, Microsoft Cloud Platform, Azure and Amazon Web Services

- Support in identifying customer requirements, seek client clarifications, understand compliance and apply modern cloud functionality to meet the requirements

- Work and develop solutions using program languages like Java, Python, SQL and more

- Design and build security in IT environments and cloud platforms

- Support in developing relevant solutions and requirements fitting well to our Journey to the Cloud strategy (J2C)

- Support in Change Management, help clients make best usage of the Accenture assets and best practices across the clouds

- Support project management or other management functions in projects

- Grow your professional skills within analytics, artificial intelligence, Big Data and machine learning

**Who are you?**
- You will soon receive your bachelor’s or master's degree within relevant area

- You want to join our Stockholm office in February or August 2025

- You have excellent written and oral presentation skills in both English and Swedish

- You are ambitious, driven, solution-oriented and motivated to start your career in a technology consulting role

**Application**
 Send your application and attach:
   

  

  

- CV

- Cover Letter (please specify which office(s) your are applying to as well as start in either February or August 2025)

- University transcripts/grades

 Upload all files under "Upload Resume/CV". Please note that all these documents are required for a complete application.
 **Only complete applications are reviewed.** 
 Due to the summer holiday season, our response times might be a bit longer than usual. Please note that we will review your application in August and get back to you shortly after. Thank you for your interest in Accenture! If your application proceeds to the next step, you will receive an invitation to two tests that aim to measure your analytical ability as well as a personality form.
   

  

**By joining Accenture, you get**
- An end-to-end focus with clients as a trusted partner and advisor to support them from strategy to execution

- Access to a global network of experts and personal co-operation with senior high-performing colleagues and market leading clients

- A career counselor/mentor who helps you define career goals and supports you in achieving your goals and your full potential

- Personal training opportunities and a market leading career-development program. Excellent possibilities for learning and knowledge gain, resulting in a great possibility to grow as both a person and a professional.

- A very strong team culture among supportive colleagues, where team spirit and cooperation are highly valued and rewarded

- Extensive wellbeing program, that boosts your overall wellbeing, energy, and ability to work in a sustainable way.

- Opportunities to get involved in corporate citizenship initiatives, from volunteering to doing charity work, as well as Inclusion & Diversity networks.

 We look forward to receiving your application! Accenture welcomes and encourages applications from diverse backgrounds related to gender, ethnicity, culture, age etc. We provide an environment of inclusion and diversity where everyone brings distinct experience, talent, and culture to their work. We invite you to be part of this diversity!
   

  

**What you also get** 
**:** 
 Accenture IF
   

  

 Accenture IF is a community hosted by our colleagues – for our colleagues, to meet and practice sports and physical activities. We offer a wide range of activities like football, racket sports, running, sailing, golf, yoga and much more.
   

  

 To exercise sports, you enjoy in the company of others, will help you stay motivated and healthy. Join our yearly events such as a cross-country skiing bootcamp, Accenture European Championship in football or an upcoming hiking trip in the mountains. We strongly believe in work-life balance and to have fun together! Parental leave
   

  

 We want our employees to grow and achieve value in life, both in their profession and in their personal life. Accenture offer a market leading compensation for parental leave – we pay for 270 days and compensate 90% of the difference between Social Insurance Agency’s (Försäkringskassan) maximum coverage and a base pay up to 80 000 SEK/month. Sick leave/Well-being
   

  

 In need of medical treatment, we want our employees to get well supported. All Accenture employees are covered by a health insurance by Skandia - Skandia Lifeline Access. The insurance offers healthcare of physical and mental treatments, including rehabilitation. During sick leave you will get well covered, Accenture pay 80% of your salary day 2-14 and 90% day 15-90. Our “Truly Human” network aim to bring us all together – as truly human individuals. We commit to care for ourselves and others, to foster an open-minded and supporting environment. Together we can help each other to achieve our aspirations and become the best version of ourselves. One of many initiatives are “Truly Human Health Academy”, a 100-day journey filled with classes held by health- and dietician experts, workshops, and buddy challenges – to learn and reflect on well-being and daily habits. Networks
   

  

 At Accenture we offer network opportunities, for our employees to meet and share common interests. Our aim is to foster a company culture that stands for inclusion and diversity – a place for everyone in terms of cross-cultural diversity, ethnicity, gender, disability, mental health, and LGBTQI.
   

  

 Equal Employment Opportunity Statement
   

  

 All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.
   

  

 Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process.

title: Spontanansökan
description:
**Kort om oss**
 Linklaters LLP lämnar juridisk rådgivning till världens ledande företag, sponsorer och finansiella institutioner i de mest komplexa transaktionerna och ärendena. Med 31 kontor i de främsta affärs- och finanscentra, levererar Linklaters en unik service till klienter över hela världen. Läs mer om oss på www.linklaters.com eller lyssna på vår podd här.
   

  

**Vem kan söka?**
 Detta är en annons skapad för dig som antingen är:
   

  

* intresserad av ett extrajobb vid sidan av dina studier, eller
* nyligen eller inom kort avslutar dina juridikstudier eller tingsnotariat och är intresserad av en heltidstjänst som biträdande jurist.


 I de fall där vi inte har en specifik annons ute kan du använda denna annons för att visa ditt intresse för en eventuell anställning hos oss.
   

  

*Eftersom denna annons avser spontanansökningar kommer vi endast att återkoppla till de sökande om ett behov uppstår, och då till dem vars profil stämmer överens med våra krav.*
 Vid frågor, vänligen kontakta Marie Lundqvist, HR Advisor.
   

  

**Technical Skills**
**This list of duties and responsibilities above is not exhaustive. It is intended to describe the general content of, and requirements for, the performance of this job. As such, the role may also include the undertaking of additional tasks as required.**

title: F1RST x GlobalConnect
description:
**Spontanansökan – Praktikplats eller anställning hos GlobalConnect**
 Söker du en spännande praktikplats eller anställning efter dina studier? Hos oss på GlobalConnect är vi alltid på jakt efter nya talanger som vill utvecklas tillsammans med oss. Om du inte hittar en specifik roll som passar just nu på vår karriärsida, kan du ändå skicka in din spontanansökan.
   

  

 Vi kommer att vara på plats under
 **F1RST Career Day** 
 den
 **16 oktober 2024** 
 , och vi ser fram emot att träffa dig! Oavsett om du är intresserad av en praktikplats eller en framtida anställning, är vi här för att svara på dina frågor och berätta mer om våra möjligheter.
   

  

**Vem kan skicka in en spontanansökan:**
* Studenter eller nyutexaminerade med intresse för IT, teknik, affärsutveckling eller finans.
* Engagerade personer som vill växa och bidra till en dynamisk och innovativ arbetsmiljö.


**Vad vi erbjuder:**
* En inkluderande och stödjande arbetskultur med fokus på personlig utveckling.


**Hittar du ingen roll just nu?** 
 Om du söker en praktikplats eller anställning men inte hittar en ledig roll på vår karriärsida just nu, lämna gärna ditt CV eller din LinkedIn-profil via den här annonsen. Vi går igenom din profil för att se om det finns en passande möjlighet inom vår organisation.
   

  

**Möt oss på F1RST Career Day**
 Kom förbi oss för att nätverka, ställa frågor, och lämna din spontanansökan. Vi ser fram emot att träffa dig och diskutera dina framtida karriärmöjligheter!
   

  

**Denna annons kommer endast att vara öppen från 2024-10-16 till 2024-10-17. Skicka därför din ansökan så snart som möjligt!**

title: SAP Consultant
description:
**Job Title: SAP WCM (and PM)** 




  





**Location: Stockholm, Sweden** 




  





**Hybrid Working: Full work from home with ad-hoc office visit required during a month.** 




  





**Client: Multinational Power Company** 




  





**Assignment Length: Initial 1 year Contract (possibility of further extension)** 




  





**Assignment Type: Residential** 




  





**Work Schedule: 8 Hours per day/ 5 days a week** 




  





**Job description:**




  





**Duties:** 




 - Consultant needs to be located in Sweden or happy to relocate to the country.
 



 - There is travel required and the person should be "on and off" onsite in Germany (Thüringen). SO travel is required in general, but not every week. The consultant may also need to travel to the Netherlands.
 


* Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, including technical consultants, ABAP developers, and other functional consultants
* Configuring SAP WCM (and PM) modules to meet specific business requirements and implementing custom solutions.
* Facilitating communication between technical and non-technical stakeholders to address issues and ensure smooth integration
* Conducting thorough testing and validation to ensure the seamless transition of functionalities from the old system to the new one.
* Adapting to changing project requirements and collaborating with various functional consultants and key users from MM, FI, and authorization modules
* Analyze and understand the business processes and requirements, specifically related to Work Clearance Management.
* Design and configure SAP WCM solutions to meet business needs, ensuring alignment with best practices.
* Understand custom developments
* Write requirement gathering, create delta lists
* Help writing the WCM part in blueprints



  





**Skills:** 



* 5+ years of experience in SAP WCM (and PM) with a strong understanding of both functional and technical aspects.
* Strong understanding of SAP WCM & PM processes with at least 5 years of experience in implementation or support roles.
* Process understanding of standard processes in SAP WCM & PM.
* Being able to communicate between business and other functional consultants.
* Proficient in reading and understanding ABAP code for error analysis and communicating technical requirements to ABAP developers.
* **Fluent in both English and German (speaking, reading, and writing) to effectively communicate with stakeholders in multinational environments**



  





 Other nice to have skills:
 






1. Deep understanding of SAP WCM modules, including work permit management, isolation management, and risk assessment.
2. Proficiency in configuring and customizing SAP WCM to meet business requirements.
3. Proficiency in writing blueprints, write down requirements from requirement workshops.
4. Strong knowledge of integrating SAP WCM with other SAP modules like PM (Plant Maintenance), MM (Materials Management), and EHS (Environment, Health, and Safety)

title: Workday Integrations Specialist
description:
**Job Description**
**Role Summary:**
 We are looking for a dedicated Workday Integrations Specialist to join our People Tech team. This role involves crafting and managing integrations within Workday, enhancing system functionality, and providing essential support to our business operations.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
**Integration Development and Management:**
* Collaborate with stakeholders to understand integration needs and objectives.
* Design and implement robust integration solutions connecting Workday with internal and external systems using tools such as Workday Studio, EIB, and Core Connectors, Picof/ PECI
* Ensure the accuracy, efficiency, and security of data through comprehensive testing and error management.
* Provide ongoing support and maintenance for existing integrations, serving as the primary technical contact for business teams.
* Document all integration processes and maintain a detailed log of system changes and updates.


**System Configuration and Enhancement:**
* Develop custom Workday Extend applications by working closely with business stakeholders to meet their needs.
* Recommend and implement improvements and innovations within the Workday platform.
* Lead the integration aspects of Workday system upgrades, ensuring compatibility and functionality with new releases.


**Compliance and Collaboration:**
* Work alongside the HR team to ensure system security, business process compliance, and alignment with audit requirements such as SOC and SOX.
* Engage with the broader Workday community to stay abreast of new technologies and best practices, using this knowledge to propose solutions that address business challenges.


**Project and Implementation Leadership:**
* Lead Workday integration projects from conception through to successful execution, ensuring alignment with the overall People Tech roadmap.
* Manage the implementation of system configurations, testing, training, and deployment to enhance user adoption and satisfaction.


**Our humble expectations**
**Our humble expectations:**
* 3-4 years of experience in Workday integration development and support, including at least 1 year of experience with Workday Extend.
* Demonstrable knowledge of Workday technologies such as Workday Studio, EIBs, Core Connectors, BIRT Reporting, PECI, Cloud Connectors, and Document Transformation.
* Proficiency in data transformation languages including XSLT and XTT/ETV.
* Strong capability in designing complex reports and dashboards.
* Excellent analytical skills and the ability to manage sensitive and confidential information with discretion.
* Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with a proven track record of effective project management and cross-functional collaboration.
* A Workday integration certification is highly desirable.


**Candidate Profile:**
* You are a creative problem-solver who is enthusiastic about leveraging technology to streamline and enhance business processes.
* You possess a solid understanding of core HR business practices and are adept at applying this knowledge in a technical environment.
* Your approach is proactive, and you are recognized for your organizational skills and your ability to lead projects effectively.
* Join our team and contribute to our mission of maximizing the potential of our HR technologies to drive business success.


**Next Steps**
 If you are excited about working in a high-growth environment, taking ownership, and being part of an extremely ambitious team, then click below to apply and get the conversation going!
   

  

 If you have any further questions about the position, you can turn to:
   

  

 Orsi Kocsis, Senior Talent Acquisition Partner - orsolya.kocsis@wolt.com
   

  

 Please note that
 **we do not accept applications sent by mail** 
 . You should submit your application through our careers website!
   

  

**About Wolt**
*Wolt is a Helsinki-based technology company that provides an online platform for consumers, merchants, and couriers. It connects people looking to order food and other goods with people interested in selling and delivering them. To enable this, Wolt develops a wide range of technologies from local logistics to retail software and financial solutions – as well as operating its own grocery stores under the Wolt Market brand. Wolt’s products include Wolt+ (subscription service for customers), Wolt for Work (meal benefits and office deliveries for companies), Wolt Drive (fast last-mile deliveries for merchants), and Wolt Self-Delivery (service for merchant partners with their own delivery staff). Wolt’s mission is to make cities better by empowering and growing local communities. Wolt was founded in 2014 and joined forces with DoorDash in 2022. DoorDash operates in 31 countries today, 27 of which are with the Wolt product and brand.*
***So, why work at Wolt?***
**At Wolt, We’re About Getting Things Done.**
 You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself, and being around friendly, humble, and ambitious people.
   

  

*We work hard to make cities into better places, and it’s pretty cool seeing us grow every week. If you’re passionate about building things that just… work, Wolt might be for you.*
***Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion**
 We want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.*
*Join us today to build Wolt together.*

title: Enterprise Architect to Group CIO | SEB, Solna
description:
SEB is a leading northern European financial services group, and at the same time, one of the largest IT employers in the Nordics. Banking is changing rapidly, and we are proud of our reputation for being entrepreneurial and innovative in the face of change. At the same time, we take a long-term view when working with our customers and driving towards sustainable future.
   

  

 Are you a Senior Solution Architect, Domain Architect or similar and wants to take the next step in your career? We are now looking for a new Enterprise Architects for the SEB Group´s Architecture team located in Stockholm.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
 The technology, data and infrastructure landscape at SEB is undergoing a constant change and modernization with aim to take advantage of several different technologies for relevant workloads.
   

  

 As Enterprise Architect, you help shape and drive SEB’s strategic agenda towards digital world class services for SEB’s customers. Your main focus is to create and drive target architecture in line with business objectives to improve quality and time to market of change activities, primarily those with a significant IT impact. You will work broadly across all departments of SEB and support different stakeholders who are in need of your expertise. That means you will guide and support development activities – both on strategic and operative levels. You will also provide C-level strategic support, for example in due diligence processes.
   

  

 The position will focus on our Information and Data architecture in the ambition to be a data driven enterprise.
   

  

 Our enterprise architecture team works as a central function and interacts with most parts of the SEB Group enabling personal development, education, and growth. The team currently consists of experienced and dedicated professionals who are focusing on developing architecture and strategy across all divisions and client segments within SEB.
   

  

**Who We Are Looking For**
* You have broad knowledge of products, processes and current solutions as well as target architecture and solution concepts within different areas
* You have experience of organizational design, quality systems and design of operating models on enterprise scale.
* You have experience of driving modern digital development in an agile context and promote finding better ways of working, skills & workforce development, utilization rate of common solutions
* You have excellent networking and communication skills within both business and IT, combined with the ability to understand business needs and requirements and turn them into technical solutions while designing sustainable architecture concepts
* You have great leadership skills and an ability to handle complexity on a strategic level
* You are passionate about driving and accelerating change, while at the same time preserving robust systems
* You are result- and business oriented and take personal responsibility for creating and delivering high-value results
* It will be of great value if you have specific knowledge within cloud and/or modern data architecture. For the position, hands on experience in Data Mesh based architecture, Information modelling and technologies will be of great value.
* Furthermore, we think that you have excellent capabilities to engage people and build relationship. But the most important asset you have is your passion for the possibilities of new technique and your inner motivation to help more people discover the possibilities it provides.


**What We Offer**
 We offer many experiences and benefits to our employees, and there is nuance to every individual’s career experience, but the elements that define the core of our offering are:
   

  

* Attractive compensation and benefits
* Access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits
* Innovative company in forefront of technology
* Agile and modern ways of working


**Ready to join?**
 Attach your CV and a personal letter describing yourself and how you can contribute to this role. Since we select candidates on an ongoing basis, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 2024-10-31. If you have questions about the position, please contact Talent Acquisition Partner Katarina Pihl at katarina.pihl@seb.se

title: Enterprise Account Director – Talent Solutions, Nordics
description:
**Company Description**
 LinkedIn is the world’s largest professional network, built to create economic opportunity for every member of the global workforce. Our products help people make powerful connections, discover exciting opportunities, build necessary skills, and gain valuable insights every day. We’re also committed to providing transformational opportunities for our own employees by investing in their growth. We aspire to create a culture that’s built on trust, care, inclusion, and fun – where everyone can succeed.
   

  

 Join us to transform the way the world works.
   

  

**Job Description**
 This role will be based in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

 At LinkedIn, we trust each other to do our best work where it works best for us and our teams. This role offers a hybrid work option, meaning you can both work from home and commute to a LinkedIn office, depending on what’s best for you and when it is important for your team to be together.
   

  

 We are looking for an Enterprise Account Director to join our Talent Solutions team, in acting as a trusted adviser and bringing value to our customers, focusing on the business. As a member of our Talent Solutions Sales Team, you will be a part of an experienced group of sales professionals who are bringing LinkedIn’s Talent Solutions products (Hiring and Learning) to the Enterprise Customers.
   

  

 You will be responsible for helping our customers effectively engage with the LinkedIn network using our professional hiring and learning solutions. You will be dedicated to making our customers stronger and seeking out opportunities for growth. Although you possess a strategic approach to selling and strive to meet/exceed revenue goals, you will always have your clients’ best interest in mind and act as their internal advocate to ensure they are set up for success.
   

  

**Responsibilities:**
* Researches Customer’s business and prepares thoughtful questions and insights in advance of customer meetings
* Asks layered, open-ended questions to understand and clarify Customer’s objectives and challenges beyond surface-level detail
* Builds relationships with multiple stakeholders (vertically and horizontally) across the Customer’s organization
* Shifts communication style and content to fit the needs of different stakeholders
* Leads with Solutions, not products, when making recommendations aligned to Customer objectives
* Sells with Integrity
* Drives customer decision making by achieving shared vision and proactively considering the value props that tie all stakeholders together
* Thinks commercially and applies business acumen when crafting & negotiating commercial agreements
* Uses data and insights to support investment recommendations or overcome customer objections
* Proactively mitigates churn risk by adopting a smart, customer-centric approach
* Engages customers throughout to confirm and clarify value and adapts a strategy when needed to optimize ROI
* Drives Customer growth by proactively identifying opportunities to deliver greater customer value
* Applies business acumen in Account Planning by considering economic, industry, and company factors with a Customer-centric lens.
* Maps all key stakeholders in an account to assess the strength of the account relationship and create account outreach strategy
* Agrees to joint accountability with colleagues and cross-functional teams for optimal customer success
* Practices humility and asks for help from colleagues when faced with a challenge or unknown
* Is disciplined in Territory and Account Planning, Forecasting, and Quota Attainment
* Follows best practices when using CRM and other Sales tools in order to manage the Sales and Buyer cycles


**Qualifications**
**Basic Qualifications:**
* 5+ years of applicable sales experience
* Business fluency in English


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Business fluency in Swedish, Danish, Norwegian, or Finnish
* Experience with HR software
* Experience with SaaS opportunities
* Experience selling IT solutions
* Knowledge of software contract terms and conditions with the ability to create fair transactions
* Strong negotiation and accurate forecasting skills
* Experience carrying a revenue target with the ability to develop compelling strategies that deliver results
* Excellent communication, negotiation and forecasting skills
* Demonstrated ability to find and manage high-level business in an evangelistic sales environment
* Ability to gather and use data to inform decision making and persuade others
* Ability to assess business opportunities and read prospective buyers
* Ability to orchestrate the closure of business with an accurate understanding of prospect needs
* Ability to include multiple partners and members of the company management team using competitive selling to position company products against direct and indirect competitors


**Suggested Skills:**
* Negotiation and forecasting skills
* Consultative Selling
* Stakeholder Management


**Additional Information**
**Global Data Privacy Notice for Job Candidates**
 Please follow this link to access the document that provides transparency around the way in which LinkedIn handles personal data of employees and job applicants: https://legal.linkedin.com/candidate-portal.

title: Data Analyst for Ventures and New Business
description:
**About Us**
 Everyone working at Scania is united by a common purpose: Driving the shift towards a sustainable transport system. We know that the transport industry must change, and it’s a change we want to lead. Scania’s continuous transformative work within circularity, electrification and autonomy shows commercial ideas, powerful insights and competencies that make real change happen.
   

  

 Ventures and New Business at Scania have a key role in driving the shift and contributing to this vision. We develop and deliver new businesses, supporting Scania’s long-term growth and profitability ambitions. At Ventures and New Business, we develop complementing solutions to our core and build new growth through ventures and investments that strengthen and support our acceleration, driving the shift. We want to engage and inspire our entire organisation to create results together with us, and collaboration and entrepreneurial spirit are part of our culture and what makes us successful.
   

  

 We are today a team of approximate 45+ people and have five ventures. Our office space is very central at Drottninggatan in Stockholm.
   

  

**Job Description**
 As a Venture Data Analyst you will play a crucial role in supporting the growth and success of new business ventures by providing actionable insights through data analysis. By collecting, analysing, and interpreting data you will help guide strategic decisions and optimise business performance.
   

  

 Reporting to our Tech Domain Manager, you will be aligned with one of our ventures while also working closely with other colleagues within your domain to share expertise and best practices.
   

  

 Key responsibilities
   

  

 In the role of Data Analyst for a venture your key responsibilites will be:
   

  

  

* Data Collection and Management: Gathering, cleaning, and maintaining data from various sources to ensure accuracy and reliability for analysis.
* Data Analysis: Conducting thorough data analysis to identify trends, patterns, and insights that inform business strategies and decision-making.
* Reporting and Visualisation: Creating clear and compelling reports, dashboards, and visualisations to communicate analytical findings to stakeholders.
* Performance Monitoring: Tracking key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to monitor the health and progress of business ventures.
* Market Research: Conducting market research and competitor analysis to provide context and support strategic planning.
* Collaboration: Working closely with cross-functional teams, including product development, marketing, and finance, to align data insights with business objectives.
* Recommendations: Providing actionable recommendations based on data analysis to help optimise operations, improve customer experience, and drive growth.


**About You**
 We seek someone with strong experience within data analytics. It is important that you are a positive influence and a good collaborator as you will interact with a wide array of internal and external stakeholders. Good communication skills are also key since you will be interacting closely with business executives both across the company and externally. You are a goal-oriented doer and a team player that loves to see how our business is growing.
   

  

 We also believe that you (requirements):
   

  

  

* Have a master’s degree in Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics or similar field.
* Bring 3+ years of experience in the analytics field, experience within the logistic industry is a plus.
* Possess a high degree of autonomy and can work independently on complex analyses.
* Have a solid and broad analytical skills-set including the ability to use statistical methods.
* Are proficient in using data extraction tools.
* Have experience working with BI tools such as QlikSense or Tableau.
* Thrive in in a fast-growing company.
* Are fluent in English


 What we offer:
   

  

 We offer you the chance to be part of an organisation that is focused on reaching Scania’s targets and truly driving the shift to a sustainable transport system. Joining our team you will get to enjoy the flexibility and agility of a startup enviroment while benefiting from the stability and security of being employed by one of Sweden's largest companies. With the opportunities of the current transformative changes within the transport industry, we are on a very exciting journey. This is the right time to join us!
   

  

 Information and application
   

  

 Questions about the role? Contact linda.rosenqvist@scania.com
   

  

 We are working with an ongoing selection; please apply as soon as possible if you are interested, but no later than 2024-10-31.
   

  

 Kindly note that a background check might be conducted for this position.
   

  

*Scania is one of Sweden's largest companies and offers trucks and buses for heavy transport in combination with a wide range of product-related services. Our mission is to drive the transition to a sustainable transport system by developing safe, smart and energy-efficient transport solutions that are better for both people and our planet. Today, Scania have around 50,000 employees in around 100 countries. For more information visit Scania.com*

title: Systemadministratör - Vikariat
description:
Vad kommer du att få göra som Systemadministratör?
   

  

 Den har tjänsten omfattar ett vikariat på 5 månader med möjlighet till förlängning.
   

  

 I ditt ansvar som Systemadministratör ingår det exempelvis att:
   

  

* Ansvara för utveckling, förvaltning och användarsupport av Advantum, Octapharmas system för anläggningsinformation
* Ansvara för utbildning och behörighetshantering
* Inventera och uppdatera teknisk dokumentation


 Vem är du?
   

  

* Gymnasieutbildning med teknisk inriktning
* Kunskaper i databassystem
* Svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
* Det är meriterande om du har kunskaper och erfarenheter av AutoCAD


 Vi ser det också som meriterande om du i en tidigare roll arbetat med liknade arbetsuppgifter eller slutfört en Yrkeshögskoleutbildning inom Teknik eller IT. Har du dessutom erfarenhet från Advantum eller likande system så ser vi det som ett stort plus.
   

  

 Då du kommer att arbeta med utbildning och förvaltning, bör du vara trygg med att arbeta i en ledande roll med mycket ansvar. Du kommer ha många kontaktytor inom Octapharma så för att vara framgångsrik i rollen behöver du ha ett driv, en positiv attityd, vara strukturerad och ha god samarbetsförmåga. Vi ser gärna att du är bra på att prioritera ditt arbete och motiveras av att slutföra uppgifter.
   

  

 Avdelningen inom Technical Unit
   

  

* Technical Unit är organiserat i avdelningarna Engineering, Maintenance, Facility & Utilities, Automation & Metrology
* Technical Unit ansvarar för att produktionsanläggningen, byggnader och övrig utrustning finns på plats och fungerar
* Funktionen är helt avgörande för att verksamheten ska fungera på ett hållbart sätt
* Vi investerar kontinuerligt i siten, vilket medför modernisering och expansion
* Avdelningen består av 14 personer och du rapporterar till chefen för avdelningen


 Vad är det bästa med att jobba hos oss?
   

  

* Du bidrar till att rädda liv - Varje dag är meningsfull då vi tillverkar livräddande läkemedel
* Förmåner – Bonusprogram, förmånsportal med förmånliga deals och erbjudanden samt naprapat på arbetsplatsen med flera.
* Familjära värderingar - Långsiktigt perspektiv gällande personal och relationer
* Bistro bryggeriet – Varje dag serveras hemlagad mat och vi har ett eget bageri/kafé
* Kompetensutveckling - Vi erbjuder bland annat flertalet olika medarbetar- och ledarskapsutbildningar, både interna och externa, trainee-program samt digitala lösningar


 Ansök idag!
   

  

 Har du frågor om tjänsten, kontakta Sofie Önnestam på 076-000 46 55 eller mejl sofie.onnestam@octapharma.com. Sista ansökningsdag är 2024-11-06, tjänsten kan tillsättas dessförinnan.
   

  

 Om du går vidare i processen
   

  

* Vi vill tidigt i processen samla in så mycket fakta som möjligt för att kunna göra den bästa matchningen
* Inom några dagar kommer du få utföra arbetspsykologiska tester
* Testerna görs tidigt i processen eftersom vi vill säkerställa ett objektivt, fördomsfritt och rättvist urvalsarbete


 Vill du lära känna oss bättre? Lär mer om Technical Unit på vår hemsida och följ oss dag för dag på LinkedIn!
   

  

 Fackliga kontaktpersoner
   

  

 Unionen, Zahra Kafash-Hoshyar, 08-566 433 13
   

  

 Akademikerföreningen, Ann-Charlotte Hinz, 08-566 431 35

title: Chef Infrastruktur
description:
Är du en engagerad ledare med fallenhet för att inspirera och utveckla andra? Har du ett starkt intresse för IT-infrastruktur och drivs av att arbeta strategiskt och operativt i en dynamisk och entreprenörsdriven miljö? Då kan vi på Svedea ha rätt utmaningen för dig! Vi söker nu en Chef för vår Infrastrukturavdelning som kommer att ansvara för att driva vår IT-infrastruktur framåt.
   

  

**Om tjänsten**
 Som Chef för Infrastruktur på Svedea har du det övergripande ansvaret för vår IT-infrastruktur, inklusive IT-säkerhet och IT-support. Du ansvarar för det strategiska, taktiska och operativa arbetet med att driva och möjliggöra teknisk innovation. Du rapporterar till CIO och ingår i IT-ledningsgruppen.
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden och arbetsuppgifter:
   

  

* Leda, utmana och utveckla ett team bestående av tre infrastrukturspecialister och en supporttekniker.
* Ansvara för drift och underhåll av Svedeas IT-infrastruktur för att säkerställa hög tillgänglighet och driftsäkerhet.
* Utveckla och implementera strategier för IT-infrastruktur, inklusive IT-säkerhet och support.
* Vara operativt involverad och stödja teamet i det dagliga arbetet, inklusive felsökning och problemlösning.
* Samverka med andra avdelningar för att säkerställa att IT-stödet möter verksamhetens mål.
* Driva förändringsprojekt och initiativ för att ständigt förbättra infrastrukturen och IT-säkerheten.
* Säkerställa att IT-säkerhetsrutiner efterlevs och kontinuerligt förbättras för att möta föränderliga hotbilder och regulatoriska krav.
* Hantera och optimera IT-budgeten samt ansvara för upphandlingar och leverantörskontakter.


 Tjänsteort är på vårt kontor i Stockholm eller Umeå.
   

  

**Din bakgrund**
 På Svedea lägger vi stor vikt vid personlighet och potential. Vi söker dig som är en engagerad ledare med förmågan att inspirera, engagera och utveckla andra. Du är lyhörd och kommunikativ samt trivs med att samarbeta med olika delar av organisationen för att skapa effektiva IT-lösningar som stödjer våra affärsmål. Dessutom är du flexibel, lösningsorienterad och kan kavla upp ärmarna när det behövs. Med ditt strukturerade arbetssätt hanterar du både kortsiktiga och långsiktiga uppgifter framgångsrikt.
   

  

 Andra krav för tjänsten är att du har:
   

  

* relevant eftergymnasial utbildning inom IT, datavetenskap eller liknande, alternativt motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet.
* minst 7–10 års erfarenhet inom IT-infrastruktur.
* erfarenhet av att arbeta operativt i en "hands-on”-roll och vana att hantera både små och stora, komplexa tekniska problem.
* erfarenhet av att hantera och optimera IT-budgetar och kostnader.
* förmåga att driva strategiskt arbete och samtidigt vara aktiv i det dagliga operativa arbetet.
* god kunskap inom IT-säkerhet, särskilt säkerhetsstrategier, incidenthantering och efterlevnad av säkerhetsstandarder.


 Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av att leda och utveckla team.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig**
* En stimulerande och dynamisk arbetsmiljö där du får möjlighet att arbeta med spännande projekt och teknik.
* Bra förmåner och 5000 kr i friskvårdsbidrag.
* Ledarforum fyra gånger per år där inspiration, utbildning och erfarenhetsutbyte med andra ledare på Svedea står i fokus.
* En inspirerade företagskultur som kännetecknas av laganda med passionerade och engagerande kollegor som förstår vikten av att hjälpas åt och att ha kul tillsammans. Mer om vår kultur hittar du här
* Möjlighet till visst distansarbete för att kunna balansera privat- och arbetsliv.
* Fantastiska kontorslokaler centralt belägna, spana in våra kontor här - Stockholm och Umeå!


**Låter det intressant?**
 Välkommen med din ansökan! Vi arbetar löpande med urval så vänta inte utan skicka in din ansökan redan idag, sista ansökningsdag är den 31 oktober. Tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Observera att vi enbart tar emot ansökningar via länken i annonsen. Har du frågor om tjänsten eller processen är du välkommen att kontakta CIO Gustaf Ledin, mejl: Gustaf.Ledin@svedea.se eller tel: 076-697 52 54.
   

  

**Om Svedea**
 Svedea är en framgångssaga. Våra första fjorton år har gjort oss till det ledande bolaget inom försäkring av fritidsfordon som motorcykel, båt och snöskoter och vi är en stark utmanare inom bil-, djur- och företagsförsäkring. Idag har vi omkring 400 000 kunder och fortsätter att växa snabbt.
   

  

 Vår vision är att förändra försäkringsbranschen och vi strävar efter att våra kunder ska tycka att försäkring är enkelt. Hemligheten bakom vår framgång är engagerade medarbetare som trivs på jobbet i kombination med en tydlig företagskultur. Nu ökar vi tempot för att fortsätta växa, behålla de mest engagerade medarbetarna och de nöjdaste kunderna\*. Vår resa har bara börjat!
   

  

* Svenskt Kvalitetsindex (SKI) har tilldelat Svedea utmärkelsen Sveriges nöjdaste kunder i kategorin fordonsförsäkringar 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022 och 2023 samt i kategorin djurförsäkring 2023.

title: EEZE Consulting söker nu till en kund en erfaren IT Management-konsult!
description:
Vi är ett konsultföretag inom IT som också startat upp en YH-skola och har tagit fram produkten Oden BI. Vi har utsetts till Årets bästa arbetsgivare i Europa av European Business Awards.
 



 Men vad utmärker oss? Vad driver oss? Vad vill vi åstadkomma? Varför ska man jobba hos oss?
 



 Som konsult hos oss får man vara en del av ett familjärt, kreativt och entreprenöriellt IT-konsultbolag. Som konsult hos oss får du en konsultchef som gör allt och lite till för att hitta bra uppdrag till dig. I samarbete med konsulten skriver vi uppdragsanpassade cv:n och coachar dig inför varje intervju så att du ska känna dig så redo det bara går inför intervjuerna. Vi hjälper dig med komplettering av kunskap och certifieringar för att öka dina möjligheter att få bra uppdrag och förverkliga din potential.
 



 Vi har många som arbetat många år hos oss och vi jobbar hårt för att alla individer ska kännas sig hemma, inkluderade, trivas och vilja stanna. Självklart har vi afterworks men också familjeevent där de som har familj kan ta med sig barn och partner, vi har LAN och rollspel samt träningsinriktade aktiviteter bland annat.
 



 Två konferenser per år, en i Sverige och en i utlandet.
 



 Vi har sedan start arbetat med att som företag lämna ett positivt avtryck för omvärlden. Bland annat har vi hjälp till i Laos med att bygga en skola och vi har också flera projekt här för att hjälpa hemlösa. Projekten vi driver och deltar startas ofta på initiativ av våra anställda utifrån deras engagemang.
 



**Arbetsbeskrivning:** 




 Vi letar efter erfarna konsulter inom IT Management med minst 9 års erfarenhet. Vi ser gärna att kandidaterna har arbetat med större projekt, gärna inom offentlig sektor, bank, försäkring eller storbolag. Det är mycket meriterande om kandidaten har en IT-relevant examen från högskola eller universitet. Som konsult hos oss bidrar man med sin expertkunskap ute hos våra kunder.
 



 Kandidaten bör ha erfarenhet av och vilja att jobba inom minst två av följande roller:
 



 Projektledare
 



 Teknisk Projektledare
 



 Kravanalytiker
 



 Produktägare
 



 Förvaltningsledare
 



 Förändringledare IT
 







**Krav och meriter:** 




 Vi ser gärna att kandidaten har erfarenhet av följande tekniker och verktyg:
 


* SAFe
* Projektstyrningsmodeller såsom Scrum, Prince2, PMP etc
* LEAN
* Microsoft Azure (eller annan molnplattform)
* Jira, Confluence, Azure Devops CI/CD
* Stakeholder Management
* Intressenthantering
* Kommunikativ och strukturerad







 Det är meriterande om kandidaten har certifieringar inom ett eller flera av följande alternativ:
 


* Scrum
* SAFe
* Prince2
* PMP/PMI
* IREB
* REQB
* ITIL
* PM3
* Astrakan-utbildningar







**Personlighet och egenskaper:** 




 Vi letar efter kandidater som är snälla och omtänksamma och som passar in i vår företagskultur där samarbete och att hjälpa varandra är centralt. Kandidaten ska uppskatta att bidra till hela teamets utveckling och framgång. Kandidaten bör ha en stark förmåga att presentera sin tidigare erfarenhet på ett tydligt sätt. Som person ska kandidaten ha en lösningsfokuserad inställning och se positivt på att ta till sig nya tekniker och möjligheter vilket krävs inom IT.
 



**Utvecklingsmöjligheter:** 




 Vårt mål är att skapa de bästa förutsättningarna för våra konsulter att utvecklas och nå sin fulla potential. Vi uppmuntrar därför alla våra anställda att kontinuerligt utveckla sina kunskaper och färdigheter. Vill en konsult ta ett certifikat står vi självklart för kurser och certifieringskostnader. Om konsulten tar certifikatet på sin fritid betalar både certifieringskostnad och en bonus.
 



**Förmåner:** 




 Vi arbetar regelbundet med att se över och utveckla vårt paket med förmåner. Här presenteras ett urval av de förmåner som vi erbjuder våra konsulter:
 


* 5000 kronor per år i friskvårdsbidrag
* 3000 kronor i subvention på SL:s årskort
* Fem extra dagars ledighet i anslutning till att man får barn (utöver de 10 dagar man får genom Försäkringskassan)
* Fyra städtillfällen när man får barn så att man kan fokusera på den nyfödda bebisen istället för att städa
* Subventionerad läkarundersökning
* Rabatt på hälsokontroller hos Svensk provtagning via Benifys portal
* Från 40 års ålder bekostar Chas en hälsokontroll per år (Nivå Hälsa Bas)
* Årlig tandundersökning
* Bokbidrag
* Rabatterade matkassar
* Rabatterad barnpassning
* Rabatterad städhjälp
* Förmånligt bolån







**Lönemodell:** 




 Vi erbjuder våra konsulter en trygg och stabil anställning med fast grundlön, oavsett om konsulten för närvarande är på uppdrag eller inte. Hos oss får konsulten möjligheten att utvecklas i sin yrkesroll med en säker inkomst som bas.
 







 Svenska är ett krav!

title: Spännande möjligheter för Systemingenjörer hos Saab!
company_industry: Defense and Space Manufacturing, Security and Investigations, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
*Drivs du av att se dina idéer bli verklighet? Välkommen till vår spännande och teknikintensiva värld.*
**Din roll**
 I ett nära samarbete med engagerade kollegor kommer du att ställas inför varierande och utmanande uppgifter och din roll kommer att omfatta hela produktcykeln – från kravhantering och systemdesign till testning och implementering.
   

  

 Vår arbetskultur på Saab präglas av ett seriöst, långsiktigt och förtroendebaserat tillvägagångssätt. Vi värdesätter att ha roligt tillsammans och tror på att bygga starka och hållbara relationer. Oavsett om du är i början av din karriär eller om du är en erfaren specialist inom ditt område, är det viktigaste att du delar vår passion för utveckling och ny teknologi.
   

  

**Din profil**
 Har du kunskap inom någon av dessa områden; test, kravhantering, system-safety och aerospace? Vi är intresserade av att lära känna just dig! Vad driver dig och vad vill du utvecklas inom? På vårt kontor i Järfälla erbjuder vi en bred variation av spännande möjligheter inom system. Vi söker personer för roller som –
 ***systemingenjörer, system-safety, IT-säkerhetsexperter och test/kravingenjörer.***
 Vi värdesätter egenskaper som nyfikenhet, starkt driv och förmågan att effektivt kommunicera och samarbeta. Vi ser att du har en relevant högskole – eller civilingenjörsexamen, tillsammans med flytande kunskaper i svenska och engelska.
   

  

 Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.
   

  

**Vad du blir en del av**
 Bakom våra innovationer finns alla de som har gjort det möjligt. Modiga pionjärer och kluriga tänkare. Vardagshjältar och kreativa problemlösare. De som delar djup kunskap och de som utforskar nya områden. Och alla däremellan.
   

  

 Här har du chansen att påverka och bidra på ditt unika sätt. Allt från att utveckla kod och bygga imponerande försvars- och säkerhetslösningar till att ta en kaffe med en kollega. Varje bidrag räknas. Vi ger dig möjlighet att anta utmaningar och skapa smarta innovationer. I vår vänliga och tekniksmarta värld finns plats för dig att växa. Vi finns här för att tillsammans skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 22 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld. Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här
   

  

*Ta chansen att bli en del av vårt härliga team och gör ditt intresse för teknik till verklighet hos Saab!*

title: Graduate Consultants for Oracle, SAP and Salesforce at Accenture Technology
description:
*Are you ready to put your skills and abilities into practice? Come join Accenture in Gothenburg, Malmö or Stockholm in February or August 2025 and let us help you create the perfect foundation for a career within Technology consulting!*
**Tech Talent Program** 
 When entering Accenture Technology as a graduate consultant, you will be part of our Tech Talent Program.
   

  

  

- During the two-year Tech Talent Program, you will go through an intense learning process – with a Buddy and People Lead helping and coaching you to figure out exactly how to develop your career and skills needed to succeed.

- You will be a consultant from day one as you will be part of projects where we implement complex technology and business critical IT systems for our international clients, transforming their business.

- You will build your professional network across the organization by being part of projects, taking part in our communities and by joining our social events and parties.

**Accenture Technology** 
 Accenture Technology leverages design thinking, industry insights and the latest digital and security methodologies to help clients innovate, grow, and improve their businesses. Our expertise, capabilities and experience mean that our clients (including some of the biggest brands in the world) trust us to find the right solutions for their needs.
   

  

 Together with our talented international colleagues, we focus on connecting the needs of businesses with the new possibilities that come with technological progress.
   

  

*At Accenture's Oracle Practice,* 
 we offer you a challenging IT career and access to the kind of training, expertise and development tools that only a large company can offer. We are the number 1 system integration partner to Oracle.
 *At Accenture’s SAP practice,* 
 we bring the New to life using design thinking, agile development methodologies, and the latest smart tech like IoT, automation, and AI. We even built myConcerto, a mix of SAP and Accenture that helps lead our clients to big wins.
 *At Accenture's Salesforce practice,* 
 we have track record of implementing some of the largest Nordic Salesforce projects. We help clients drive innovation at scale, not only transforming all facets of their business, but industries as well.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Whether you are a strategic thinker, a digital innovator, a tech wizard, a business problem solver, logistic guru or if your heart beats a little bit stronger for finance: we got you covered! You can also work with Data, Analytics, Sales and Customer Service and much more if that is something that piques your interest . We would love to get to know your unique blend of talents and help you explore and grow them further.
   

  

 These are some of the responsibilities and tasks that you as a graduate may work with:
   

  

  

- Help our customers to develop the best IT solutions by being a link between business and IT. A major focus will be on digitization and automation

- Gather, analyze, and document solution requirements using business analysis techniques to capture both functional and technical requirements

- Configuration, development and maintenance of development tools, environments and platforms such as ServiceNow, SAP, Oracle and Salesforce

- Support test lead and test analysts in shaping, defining, and testing software and developments and review test cases for completeness and accuracy

- Support project management or other management functions in projects

- Grow your professional skills within analytics, artificial intelligence, Big Data and machine learning

**Who are you?**
- You will soon receive your bachelor’s or master's degree within relevant education

- Want to join us in February or August 2025

- You have excellent written and oral presentation skills in both English and Swedish

- You are ambitious, driven, solution-oriented and motivated to start your career in a technology consulting role

**By joining Accenture, you get**
- An end-to-end focus with clients as a trusted partner and advisor to support them from strategy to execution

- Access to a global network of experts and personal co-operation with senior high-performing colleagues and market leading clients

- A career counselor/mentor who helps you define career goals and supports you in achieving your goals and your full potential

- Personal training opportunities and a market leading career-development program. Excellent possibilities for learning and knowledge gain, resulting in a great possibility to grow as both a person and a professional.

- A very strong team culture among supportive colleagues, where team spirit and cooperation are highly valued and rewarded

- Extensive wellbeing program, that boosts your overall wellbeing, energy, and ability to work in a sustainable way.

- Opportunities to get involved in corporate citizenship initiatives, from volunteering to doing charity work, as well as Inclusion & Diversity networks.

 Accenture welcomes and encourages applications from diverse backgrounds related to gender, ethnicity, culture, age etc. We provide an environment of inclusion and diversity where everyone brings distinct experience, talent, and culture to their work. We invite you to be part of this diversity!
   

  

**Application**
 Send your application today and attach:
   

  

  

- CV

- Cover Letter (specify which location you are applying to as well as either start in February or August)

- University transcripts/grades

 Upload all files under "Upload Resume/CV". Please note that all these documents are required for a complete application.
 **Only complete applications are reviewed.** 
 Due to the summer holiday season, our response times might be a bit longer than usual. Please note that we will review your application in August and get back to you shortly after. Thank you for your interest in Accenture! If your application proceeds to the next step, you will receive an invitation to two tests that aim to measure your analytical ability as well as a personality form.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!
   

  

**What you also get** 
 :
 **Accenture IF**
 Accenture IF is a community hosted by our colleagues – for our colleagues, to meet and practice sports and physical activities. We offer a wide range of activities like football, racket sports, running, sailing, golf, yoga and much more.
   

  

 To exercise sports, you enjoy in the company of others, will help you stay motivated and healthy. Join our yearly events such as a cross-country skiing bootcamp, Accenture European Championship in football or an upcoming hiking trip in the mountains. We strongly believe in work-life balance and to have fun together!
 **Parental leave**
 We want our employees to grow and achieve value in life, both in their profession and in their personal life. Accenture offer a market leading compensation for parental leave – we pay for 270 days and compensate 90% of the difference between Social Insurance Agency’s (Försäkringskassan) maximum coverage and a base pay up to 80 000 SEK/month.
 **Sick leave/Well-being**
 In need of medical treatment, we want our employees to get well supported. All Accenture employees are covered by a health insurance by Skandia - Skandia Lifeline Access. The insurance offers healthcare of physical and mental treatments, including rehabilitation. During sick leave you will get well covered, Accenture pay 80% of your salary day 2-14 and 90% day 15-90. Our
 **“Truly Human”** 
 network aim to bring us all together – as truly human individuals. We commit to care for ourselves and others, to foster an open-minded and supporting environment. Together we can help each other to achieve our aspirations and become the best version of ourselves. One of many initiatives are “Truly Human Health Academy”, a 100-day journey filled with classes held by health- and dietician experts, workshops, and buddy challenges – to learn and reflect on well-being and daily habits.
 **Networks**
 At Accenture we offer network opportunities, for our employees to meet and share common interests. Our aim is to foster a company culture that stands for inclusion and diversity – a place for everyone in terms of cross-cultural diversity, ethnicity, gender, disability, mental health, and LGBTQI.

title: IT Business Engineer ERP Infor M3
CTO (Co-Founder)
company_industry: Services for Renewable Energy and Technology, Information and Media
description:
**About our client** 




 Our client is a venture capital-backed climate tech startup that aims to rewrite energy management for Europe's mid-sized companies. The startup’s cutting-edge technology platform allows energy-intensive companies to leverage real-time market data combined with intelligent algorithms to create new revenue streams from ancillary service markets, automate energy optimization, and reduce carbon emissions. All without risking their core operations.
 



  





**The Role** 




 As the CTO (co-founder), you will play a pivotal role in building a European category leader in the new energy domain. You will lead the engineering team and drive the development of cutting-edge energy solutions. Key responsibilities include setting the technical direction, ensuring scalability and reliability of the platform, and fostering a culture of innovation and excellence.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Lead and manage a growing team of talented engineers, providing mentorship and fostering a collaborative and high-performance culture.
* Drive the architectural vision and technical strategy, ensuring alignment with business goals and industry best practices.
* Oversee the development and deployment of demand response and energy optimisation software, ensuring it meets the highest standards of quality and performance.
* Ensure the use of the right technologies for the right problems.
* Promote a DevOps culture, owning deployments and setting SLOs.
* Stay abreast of industry trends and emerging technologies, continuously seeking opportunities to innovate and improve the platform.



  





**Qualifications:** 



* Proven experience in a senior engineering leadership role.
* Demonstrated ability to lead and inspire engineering teams, driving a culture of excellence and continuous improvement.
* Excellent problem-solving skills, with a focus on delivering scalable and reliable solutions.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
* Expertise in software development, with hands-on experience in Go, PostgreSQL, Docker, and related technologies is preferred.

title: IT Business Architect
description:
Are you driven by creating innovative solutions and developing business processes? Do you want to use your technical expertise and business insight to design scalable, secure, and cost-effective IT solutions?
   

  

 We are now looking for an IT Business Architect to join our dynamic team and play a pivotal role in bridging the gap between IT and business strategies. Do you want to shape the future IT landscape and make a real difference? Welcome to apply!
   

  

 Your future duties and responsibilities
   

  

 As an IT Business Architect, your main responsibilities will be solution design and bid work, which will include:
   

  

* Customer needs analysis
* Technical architecture
* Market and competitor analysis
* Bid development, presentations and negotiations


 Examples of What Your Role Will Involve:
   

  

* Business development and change management
* Gather and analyze customer's business requirements and technical needs through meetings, workshops, and interviews
* Develop and document the overall technical architecture for proposed solutions, including system architecture, data models, and integration points
* Collaborate with technical teams and act as a mentor to other consultants
* Develop and document reusable frameworks and best practices
* Create detailed and compelling bids that include solution descriptions, technical specifications, project scope, timelines, and cost estimates
* Conduct market and competitor analyses to ensure that the bid is competitive and meets the customer's expectations
* Participate in negotiations with customers to agree on terms and final pricing


**Required Qualifications To Be Successful In This Role**
 We expect you to have:
   

  

* At least 3 years of experience in managing complex projects or contracts
* In-depth understanding of business processes, business models, pricing models, and financial principles
* In-depth knowledge in IT infrastructure, software development, system integration, cloud services, AI, big data
* Good understanding of information security in relation to the development of technical solutions
* Documented experience in building strategic roadmaps for one or more solution areas
* The ability to analyze customer needs and design solutions that deliver business value
* Experience in applying agile methods and building strong agile teams
* Proficiency in both Swedish and English, both spoken and written


 Personal security requirements may become relevant if future assignments require it. You will be based out of one of our offices from Stockholm up to Kiruna. Travel is included in the role.
   

  

**Do you want to know more?**
 We look forward to hearing from you! Send your questions to Johanna Renberg, Director Consulting Services within Manufacturing: johanna.renberg@cgi.com. The selection for the position is ongoing.
   

  

**What can CGI offer you?**
 CGI's combination of global and local presence, with offices in 30 locations in Sweden, ensures satisfied clients but it also means that as an employee, you always have an office nearby. This, combined with flexible working hours, provides you with the opportunity of work life balance regardless of where you are in life.
   

  

 More information about our benefits:
   

  

* Stock Program and Ownership: As a shareholder, you will have the opportunity to influence. Also, in our stock program, CGI matches your contribution up to 3% of your monthly salary.
* Wellness Grant: We offer an annual wellness grant of 4,000 SEK
* Parental Leave Pay: We pay up to approximately 90% of your salary during the initial period at home
* Secure Employment: Our consultants are employed under the terms of collective agreements and are provided with insurance coverage
* Pension Solutions: We provide attractive and beneficial pension solutions
* Company Car: The company car is used as a private vehicle but is leased by CGI


**Together, as owners, let’s turn meaningful insights into action.**
 Life at CGI is rooted in ownership, teamwork, respect and belonging. Here, you’ll reach your full potential because…
   

  

 You are invited to be an owner from day 1 as we work together to bring our Dream to life. That’s why we call ourselves CGI Partners rather than employees. We benefit from our collective success and actively shape our company’s strategy and direction.
   

  

 Your work creates value. You’ll develop innovative solutions and build relationships with teammates and clients while accessing global capabilities to scale your ideas, embrace new opportunities, and benefit from expansive industry and technology expertise.
   

  

 You’ll shape your career by joining a company built to grow and last. You’ll be supported by leaders who care about your health and well-being and provide you with opportunities to deepen your skills and broaden your horizons.
   

  

 Come join our team—one of the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world.

title: Systems Architect - Student Worker
description:
Are you passionate about solving some of the world's most pressing challenges? - and excited to start your career in an international company? We are looking for a student worker to be part of our Process Automation team! Are you our new colleague?
   

  

 Our team, part of Siemens Digital Industries, is made up of dedicated and skilled professionals who are passionate about finding innovative solutions to our customers' challenges. You will work alongside the team at our office in Solna in for example, our lab environment supporting with various exciting tasks and getting the opportunity to participate in multiple projects.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* Assist with setting up and maintaining our lab environment to ensure it's up to date for customer demos and workshops.
* Support system demonstrations to customers, helping showcase how our solutions work in real-world scenarios.
* Help configure products and web-based management systems, gaining hands-on experience in software solutions.
* Contribute to various tasks, with opportunities for further development based on your skills and interests, learning important skills for your future career.


**We offer you:**
* A dynamic and hands-on opportunity to gain practical experience in real-world projects.
* The chance to work closely with industry experts in a leading global company.
* Opportunities to develop new skills and grow within the role.


**About you:**
* You are currently studying a relevant degree at a university or vocational school, such as network technology, data science, cloud environments, IT security, cybersecurity, or system architect, with at least on year remaining of your studies!
* You have an interest in technology and innovation and are eager to learn and take initiative.
* Strong written and oral communication skills in Swedish and English is required.


**Expected start:** 
 Spring 2025
   

  

**Apply today!** 
 we will be interviewing continuously. Candidates who proceed in the recruitment process will be invited to a recruitment event at our office in Solna on January 23rd. Last day for applications is November 15th . Please, merge your CV and cover letter into one document! For questions about the recruitment process please contact Recruiter Ellen Ahlberg at email: ellen.ahlberg@siemens.com
   

  

**About Siemens:**
 Siemens AG (Berlin and Munich) is a leading technology company focused on industry, infrastructure, transport, and healthcare. From more resource-efficient factories, resilient supply chains, and smarter buildings and grids, to cleaner and more comfortable transportation as well as advanced healthcare, the company creates technology with purpose adding real value for customers. By combining the real and the digital worlds, Siemens empowers its customers to transform their industries and markets, helping them to transform the everyday for billions of people. Siemens also owns a majority stake in the publicly listed company Siemens Healthineers, a globally leading medical technology provider shaping the future of healthcare.
   

  

 In fiscal 2023, which ended on September 30, 2023, the Siemens Group generated revenue of €77.8 billion and net income of €8.5 billion. As of September 30, 2023, the company employed around 320,000 people worldwide. Further information is available on the Internet at www.siemens.com.

title: Kravledare
description:
**Rollen:**
 Du kommer att jobba I två projekt, ungefär 50% i båda.
   

  

 Projekt 1: I detta projekt kommer du att ansvara för driva och samordna kravarbetet i faserna krav, upphandling och implementering. Verksamhetsområde: nätinformation.
   

  

 Projekt 2: I detta projekt kommer du att ansvara för att driva och samordna kravarbetet och i detta projekt kommer du att samarbeta med en junior kravanalytiker. Verksamhetsområde: bildanalys
   

  

 Projekten består av en projektorganisation ledd av en projektledare.
   

  

 Du ansvarar för att driva, samordna och planera arbetet samt säkerställa att kravmassan har hög kvalitet och att krav hanteras på adekvat sätt i projektets olika faser.
   

  

 Du kommer också ansvara för att vi använder rätt metod för kravarbetet i respektive projekt.
   

  

 Ska-krav:
   

  

* Gedigen erfarenhet att driva kravarbete i komplexa projekt med komplexa IT-lösningar
* Gedigen erfarenhet om hur krav hanteras i ett upphandlingsprojekt
* Gedigen erfarenhet av metoder inom krav och test och hur de används för olika situationer
* God förståelse för IT och IT-arkitektur
* Goda kunskaper i att driva och förstå arbetet med att omvandla kundkrav till design/lösningskrav och hur dessa kan verifieras och valideras


 Education:
   

  

* Högskole- eller universitetsutbildning inom relevant område.


**Var god förklara hur du uppfyller alla kraven.**
**Omfattning:** 
 100%
   

  

**Ort:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Period** 
 : ASAP - 31-03-2025
   

  

**Sista ansökningdag: 25-10-2024**
*Vi presenterar löpande. Om du är intresserad av ett uppdrag rekommenderar vi att du skickar in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.*

title: Senior Information Technology Project Manager
description:
*r du redo att leda spännande IT-tjänstetransitioner och bidra till Advanias framgång? Vi söker en erfaren och Senior Projektledare till vårt nationella projektledarteam!* 




  





**Senior transitionsprojektledare på Advania** 
 🚀
 



 Inom Advanias affärsområde Managed Services Provider hjälper vi våra kunder att digitalisera sina verksamheter och optimera sina processer med hjälp av IT-tjänster och teknik. Vi är tjänstefokuserade och arbetar med allt från implementation av public och private cloud-lösningar till skräddarsydda nätverk- arbetsplats- och supporttjänster som ökar effektiviteten och konkurrenskraften hos våra kunder. Vi tar hand om kundernas IT, så de kan fokusera på sin kärnverksamhet.
 



  





 I rollen som Senior Projektledare för transitionsprojekt ansvarar du för att leda och genomföra de allra mest komplexa transitionsprojekten från start till mål. Detta inkluderar hela projektlivscykeln från anbud och förhandling till leverans och överlämning till förvaltningsteam.
 



  





**Det innebär bland annat:** 



* Medverkan i Advanias anbudsarbete i privata och offentliga upphandlingar av IT-tjänsteavtal
* Framtagande och presentation av projektanbud för tjänstetransitioner
* Genomförande av due diligence.
* Leverans av transitionsprojekt i tid, på budget och med nöjd kund!
* Kvalitativa tjänsteetableringar vilka borgar för stabil och effektiv driftleverans över tid.
* Kontinuerlig utveckling av Advanias transitionsprocesser tillsammans med seniora kollegor



  





 Detta är en strategiskt mycket viktig roll i vårt affärsområde för managerade tjänster, och du blir en del av ett erfaret team av projektledare som ansvarar för samtliga projekt inom affärsområdet.
 



  





**Vad vi söker hos dig** 
 ✨
 



 För att du ska trivas och passa hos oss söker vi dig som har en gedigen bakgrund inom IT tjänsteleverans och en bred teknisk förståelse, med stor erfarenhet av införande av IT-tjänster till privat och offentlig verksamhet. Vi tror att du motiveras av att med ett ben kvar i leveransen leda framgångsrika projekt, lösa komplexa problem och samarbeta nära både kunder, interna team och ledning. Du uppskattar att ha stort mandat och att verka i en prestigefri arbetsmiljö där innovation och samarbete står i centrum, och där du aldrig är långt ifrån den dagliga leveransen.
 



  





**Vi söker dig som har:** 



* Erfarenhet av att leda stora transitioner av IT-tjänster
* Minst 15 års erfarenhet i IT-Branschen
* Mycket god förståelse för IT-drift och tjänster inom infrastruktur, arbetsplats och support
* God kommunikationsförmåga, flytande svenska och engelska
* Mycket starka ledaregenskaper



  





**Meriterande:** 



* Dokumenterad projektledarutbildning, gärna med certifiering inom exempelvis PRINCE2, PPS eller PMI PMP.



  





**Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!** 
 👋
 



 Visa gärna ditt intresse så snart som möjligt då vi intervjuar löpande. Vi välkomnar sökanden med olika bakgrunder, erfarenheter och synsätt, eftersom vi vet att en bredare mångfald berikar var och en av oss och stärker såväl effektivitet som kreativitet i vårt arbete.
 



  





 Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår våra slutkandidater en obligatorisk bakgrundskontroll, en för oss kvalitativ kontroll inför ett anställningsbeslut.
 



 Tveka inte att höra av dig om du har några frågor eller funderingar.
 



  





 Vi tar emot sökande på flera orter. Se annons på vår hemsida - följ länken till ansökan.

title: Financial Controller
description:
**Agigo** 
 is recruiting a
 **Financial Controller** 
 to
 **Cavotec Group** 
 , a leading cleantech company that designs and delivers connection and electrification solutions to enable the decarbonization of ports and industrial applications. Backed by more than 40 years of experience, their systems ensure safe, efficient and sustainable operations for a wide variety of customers and applications worldwide.
 



  





 Cavotec is listed on the Nasdaq OMX Stockholm with Bure Equity as one of the major shareholders. The headquarters is in Lugano, Switzerland and are located in more than 30 countries around the world, represent many cultures, and provide customers with local support, backed by the Group’s global network of engineering expertise.
 



  





 This position is based at their new office at Vasagatan 11, in the center of Stockholm.
 



  





**The role:** 




 This is an exciting opportunity as it is a new position at Cavotec and will give you exposure to the market and be part of a global firm. You will be working in Headquarter Finance team, reporting to the Consolidation Manager, supporting the consolidation process and preparation of monthly, quarterly and annual reports.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 



* Supporting completion of accurate and timely monthly, quarterly & annual group financial statements
* Perform monthly, quarterly and annual group consolidation, as well as reporting to the Swedish Stock Market
* Facilitate the Group’s multi-currency consolidation process
* Supporting local Finance Managers on internal and external business reporting tasks
* Supporting divisional Controllers and Financial Planning colleagues in delivering quality
* consolidated reports for the senior management team.
* Contributing to the Quarterly and Annual group audits.
* Creating, monitoring, evaluating and improving corporate accounting policies, procedures
* and systems.
* Supporting the Finance team in the implementation and review of the Internal Controls for
* all legal entities within the Group and performing internal audit reviews.
* Participate in improving financial consolidation and reporting tools.



  





**Qualifications:** 



* Supporting in ensuring subsidiaries' financial practices are in line with statutory regulations and legislation.
* Supporting a smooth process of local statutory audits and actively monitor audit results.
* Degree in Business Administration, or equivalent
* 3+ years working experience in a similar role
* Familiar with IFRS & Swedish Reporting requirements
* Excellent English and Swedish language skills is mandatory
* Big Four experience preferred
* Familiarity with Microsoft NAV or large ERPs, BI tools and consolidated systems, SQL and
* Power BI as an advantage
* Excellent Excel skills are essential



  





**You are:**
