 For questions about the position, please contact:
   

  

 Hiring Manager, Johan Landmark, johan.landmark@epiroc.com
   

  

 Recruitment specialist, Ellinor Ekelöf, ellinor.ekelof@epiroc.com
   

  

**Epiroc** 
 is a global productivity partner for mining and construction customers, and accelerates the transformation toward a sustainable society. With ground-breaking technology, Epiroc develops and provides innovative and safe equipment, such as drill rigs, rock excavation and construction equipment and tools for surface and underground applications. The company also offers world-class service and other aftermarket support as well as solutions for automation, digitalization and electrification. Epiroc is based in Stockholm, Sweden, had revenues of more than SEK 60 billion in 2023, and has around 18 200 passionate employees supporting and collaborating with customers in around 150 countries. Learn more at www.epiroc.com.

title: Edgenius Lead – IIoT platform, Bangalore, India or Vasteras, Sweden
description:
**Edgenius Lead – IIoT platform, Bangalore, India or Vasteras, Sweden**
=======================================================================

#### **At ABB, we are dedicated to addressing global challenges. Our core values: care, courage, curiosity, and collaboration - combined with a focus on diversity, inclusion, and equal opportunities - are key drivers in our aim to empower everyone to create sustainable solutions. Write the next chapter of your ABB story.**

### **This position reports to**


R&D Unit Lead

### **Your role and responsibilities**


Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future. At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences. In this role you lead the global R&D organization composed of several teams in global set-up that is responsible for the development and release of Edgenius and its components. In this role you have unique opportunity to further develop modern and innovative technologies by developing talents and building high performance team. Your responsibilities • Lead and develop the talents of the organization, actively involved with the teams, provides coaching and support that influence engagement and motivation • Organize the development team in the way that drives the lean-agile execution model and culture within the organization • Actively support cross-cultural collaboration and teamwork that enable synergies and efficiencies • Ensure high quality and predictable deliveries to customers • Facilitate alignment with key stakeholders, provides visualization and transparency on the status • Ensure the development is following required standards, instructions, and agreed processes • Recruit and hire talents • Communicate and ensure understanding of functional and departmental goals • Identify and implement improvements and innovations


### **Qualifications for the role**

* You have a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or a related field
* Leadership experience from R&D organizations or similar, preferably in driving change management process in the global setup
* You have a professional experience with Agile principles, Scrum and Azure DevOps
* You are a team player, fast learner following the trends, willing to work in a team spreading different countries and technologies and you have great verbal and writ-ten communication skills in English

### **More about us**


ABB Process Automation business offers a range of solutions for process and hybrid industries, including our industry-specific integrated automation, electrification and digital solutions, control technologies, software and advanced services, as well as measurement & analytics, marine and turbocharging offerings. Process Automation is #2 in the market globally. Based on its deep domain knowledge, experience and expertise in delivering world-class automation products, systems and solutions, a wide area of complimenting digital and collaborative solutions across applications and sectors, the Process Automation business helps customers remain competitive, improving their ROI and running safe and productive operations. We look forward to receiving your application. If you want to discover more about ABB, take another look at our website www.abb.com.
company_description: ABB is a leading global technology company that energizes the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future.

title: Teknisk testare (Automation, Selenium)
description:
Brinner du för att leverera högkvalitativa mjukvarulösningar? Vill du vara en nyckelspelare i att säkerställa robusta och felfria applikationer? Då har vi det perfekta uppdraget för dig!

  

Vad vi söker:

* Minst 4 års erfarenhet av teknisk testning och kvalitetssäkring
* Gedigen kunskap om testautomatisering och verktyg som Selenium
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i agila utvecklingsmiljöer
* Stark analytisk förmåga och ett öga för detaljer
* Förmåga att skriva tydliga och koncisa testfall och felrapporter
* Erfarenhet av prestandatestning och säkerhetstestning
* Utmärkt samarbetsförmåga och kommunikationsförmåga på både svenska och engelska
* Stark vilja att lära sig och kontinuerligt utvecklas inom testning och kvalitetssäkring


Meriterande kunskaper:

* Erfarenhet av CI/CD-pipelines och DevOps-processer
* Kunskaper i programmeringsspråk som Java eller Python
* Erfarenhet av API-testning och verktyg som Postman
* Certifieringar inom testning (t.ex. ISTQB)


Som konsult hos Liminity får du tillgång till marknadens bästa villkor och förmåner, inklusive:

* Spännande uppdrag hos en framåtsträvande kund
* Möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste teknologin
* Omfattande utbildningsmöjligheter och certifieringar
* Konkurrenskraftig lön och förmåner
* Och mycket mycket mer, läs mer på https://handbok.liminity.se

Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär inom teknisk testning? Ansök idag och bli en del av Liminity - framtidens IT-konsultbolag!

title: Test Lead
description:
Who we are
Telenor is rapidly heading towards the digital future and we are looking for brilliant people to join our digital transformation journey in Sweden. Do you have an interest in technology and would like to challenge the telecom industry and want to create great customer experiences? Do you have a sense of humor and prefer seeking solutions rather than pointing out problems? Then, please keep on reading.
We are transforming
At Telenor we are accelerating our digital transformation. In the Consumer IT Tribe, we are building a modern and fast-paced software development organization with a mission to enable and accelerate Telenor Sweden's Consumer business. We have the accountability to provide fast-paced software development from business support systems up to the channel layer.
Consumer IT are running several initiatives to improve the portfolio and legacy IT stack to a modern IT stack to increase stability, reliability, and overall performance of the system.
What you will do
In the role as Test Lead within Consumer IT, you will be responsible to drive large-scale transformation projects and/or programs from a quality perspective. You are responsible for overseeing the test activities throughout the entire project lifecycle and develop and implement the overall test strategy and test plan. You will define the testing scope, objectives, and deliverables, and identify test data and test environment needs to ensure the right test data and environment are available for the teams. This involves collaborating with the Consumer division, agile team leaders, product owners, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and objectives.
As Test Lead, you are responsible in leading and managing the teams, ensuring that they have the necessary skills and resources to perform their quality duties effectively. You assign tasks and responsibilities to team members and conduct regular meetings to review progress and address issues. You oversee the execution of test cases and test scripts in accordance with the defined test plan, monitor and report on test progress, defects, and other key metrics, and ensure that testing activities are completed on schedule. Identify automation scope together with the teams and ensure automation is used extensively to drive speed and efficiency.
You enforce the Consumer IT quality strategy, collaborate with other leads, developers and testers to ensure consistency in testing approaches and methodologies, and conduct reviews of test deliverables to ensure quality and accuracy. Identify and assess potential risks related to testing activities, develop and implement risk mitigation strategies, and communicate risks and mitigation plans to relevant stakeholders.
Furthermore, you ensure comprehensive documentation of test cases, test scripts, and test results, and create and maintain testing-related documentation such as test plans, test reports, and defect reports. You identify opportunities for process improvement within the testing lifecycle and implement lessons learned from previous testing phases to enhance future testing activities.
Who you are
To succeed in the role as Test Lead, you are an experienced within the area and have previous experience in leading quality in large-scale projects. We believe that you have hands-on experience in Jira/Confluence, and a strong understanding of testing methodologies, tools, and best practices. You have excellent communication skills and the ability to lead and inspire teams comes naturally to you. You are analytical and have problem-solving abilities, attention to detail, and a commitment to quality. Additionally, you have working experience in Agile/DevOps setups, understanding of CI/CD, and familiarity with different test automation frameworks.
Preferably you also have knowledge of AWS Cloud, including CloudWatch and Elastic Beanstalk, working knowledge of the TCM tool TestFLO, and experience with JMeter or other performance testing tools. Telecom experience and ISTQB certification (Test Manager) are also merited.
Our promise
A balanced workforce is key to our success. To secure that, we’re committed to fostering a working environment where our employees are supported and empowered in all areas of their work. We promise you a company eager to learn and rapidly adapt to a digital world where you will be welcomed into a skilled team of professional and knowledgeable colleagues. In addition, you will get:* A flexible way of work – We believe that flexibility and freedom to choose where and how to execute your work is a driver for performance, engagement and work life balance. We also believe in the power of better together and that the team spirit develops when we meet and interact in person, therefor our offices act as magnets for collaboration, creativity and company spirit
* A generous health and benefit package with for example wellness grant, health insurance, ”give me a break”-days, occupational pension and much more.
* Development programs to deepen your knowledge and broaden the competence


Come join the team
If you would like to know more, please contact Cajsa Lundström, cajsa.lundstrom@telenor.se.
Good to know
We recognize the power of diverse teams, and therefore we encourage everyone to apply for this position.
Application deadline: we evaluate candidates continuously so please apply today.
Location: Stockholm
According to Telenor's policy, we conduct background checks on the final candidate for all recruitments.
  
Be a part of shaping the digital future :
From Asia to the Nordics, our 16,000 employees are committed to connecting our 172 million subscribers to what matters most. We work with the latest technology to build innovative connectivity solutions that can empower societies and propel the digital future. Join us on our mission.
Our companies : Telenor Norway, Telenor Denmark, Telenor Sweden, DNA in Finland, Dtac in Thailand, Digi in Malaysia, Grameenphone in Bangladesh & Telenor Pakistan

title: ML Ops Engineer, Solna/Hybrid
description:
Do you want to be part of our in-house Machine Learning team and take part in PostNord’s digital transformation journey? Do you wish to work hands-on across the whole data engineering area? Then you should apply for this position as a ML Ops Engineer!

 **Responsibilities:**


PostNord is the leader of logistics and postal services in the Nordics. As a part of the IT organization, we support a variety of different PostNord stakeholders in a multitude of areas, such as e.g. HR, mail and logistics. We are already delivering business critical forecasting models that are an important piece of the puzzle of optimizing our operations. Our digital transformation journey started a few years back with migrating BI/DW platforms to Azure. We are now using that platform to train our ML models on our data sets to enable data-driven decision making.


Our technology is focused on the Azure stack, and includes Azure MLW, Azure ML, Azure DevOps, Power BI etc.


The Machine Learning team’s main responsibility is to develop and operate ML models used by PostNord production units. As an ML Ops engineer, your role is hands-on, focusing on operating and optimizing our ML workloads and model releases.


As an ML Ops Engineer you will lead and direct the teams DevOps practices, including version controlling and managing the teams repos.


You will be responsible for improving our monitoring/alerting systems for our ML workloads.


You'll work closely with a team of data scientists to monitor and improve model accuracy, prevent drift, and improve the cloud infrastructure.

 **Qualifications:**


To fit in the ML Ops Engineer role at PostNord you have been working with software development on an advanced level for several years. It is important that you like to remain hands on, able to take a lead role and enjoy working on complex and challenging solutions.


You have a structured approach to code management and can help the team develop code according to best practices.


As a person you are curious to learn and evolve your skill set in accordance with the state of the art pace in the domain that you work in.

**We are looking for you who have:**

* Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related field.
* Communication skills in both written and spoken English
* 5+ years of experience in data engineering, CI/CD, DevOps, or ML Ops (preferably in an Azure environment).
* Expert skills in version controlling, source code management and artifact management.
* Experience with ML Ops workflows and DevOps practices, including model versioning, automated model retraining, and monitoring.
* Familiar with AI/ML concepts and algorithms.
* Implemented ML Ops best practices such as model drift detection and model governance.

**Meritorious experience: (Nice-to-have)**

* Experience working in an agile team
* Deep understanding of core AI and ML concepts, algorithms, and their applications
* Experience with forecasting and knowledge of time series analysis, statistical modeling, and machine learning techniques.
* Experience in defining data models, schemas, and structures for efficient storage and retrieval of data.
* Azure or AWS Certified.
* Communication skills in both written and spoken Swedish.
* Experience in using containerization and orchestration tools such as Docker, Kubernetes, or Helm for building and deploying scalable and reproducible machine learning applications.
* Experienced in Azure DevOps, ADF, metadata-driven pipelines, Azure Data bricks, ARM templates, and Azure Functions.


We accept applications from all of EU but would require a remote colleague to be willing to visit on site on a regular basis.


We offer you:

* Hybrid workplace with a Nordic and dynamic environment
* Wellness allowance & access to the office´s gym and health center (Solna).
* Employee benefits through PostNord’s own personnel foundation PostNord Plus.
* Great occupational pension terms.
* Great development opportunities and a continuous learning culture.
* Employment in Solna/Hybrid.


Welcome with your application!


Selection is ongoing and we want your application as soon as possible. For questions about the role contact us through our recruitment platform Varbi.

**About PostNord Group AB**


We make everyday life easier! PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal- and logistic services to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region.


We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless if we lead ourselves or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at www.postnord.com

  

For union representatives, visit: www.postnord.com/fackliga

title: Senior forskningsinfrastrukturspecialist inom Artificiell Intelligens och Digital Hälsa
description:
**Vill du bidra till medicinsk forskning av toppkvalitet?**
-----------------------------------------------------------


Denna tjänst är inriktad på artificiell intelligens (AI) och digital hälsa, med särskilt fokus på att utveckla och stödja forskningsinfrastrukturen vid Karolinska Institutet inom dessa områden. Forskningsområdet omfattar tillämpningar av AI i medicinsk teknologi och hälsovård, inklusive signalbehandling, medicinsk bildanalys och utveckling av digitala hälsoplattformar.

### **Din roll**


Som Senior forskningsinfrastrukturspecialist kommer du att:

* Leda och utveckla forskningsinfrastrukturen för AI och digital hälsa, med särskilt ansvar för core facilities, inklusive hantering av verktyg som Agilent iLab och Nvidia DGX-servrar
* Tillhandahålla kvalificerad kompetens samt teknisk och/eller metodologisk service och utveckling inom AI och medicinsk teknologi, med fokus på att stärka både service och utveckling
* Arbeta självständigt och visa betydelsefulla insatser inom flera tekniker och metoder, med ett brett och djupt kompetensområde
* Implementera och underhålla DevOps-metodologier för att säkerställa effektiv och säker utveckling samt drift av mjukvarulösningar inom forsknings- och kliniska applikationer
* Ansvara för och underhålla IT-arkitektur som stödjer både forsknings- och kliniska behov, med en god förståelse för din roll i att möjliggöra avancerad forskning och kliniskt arbete
* Bidra till och leda forskningsprojekt inom AI och medicinsk teknologi, inklusive projektledning och samordning av internationella samarbeten, särskilt EU-finansierade projekt
* Ansvara för undervisning och utbildningsutveckling inom medicinsk teknologi, signalbehandling och AI för både tekniska och kliniska studenter, inklusive roller som kursansvarig och examinator
* Handleda och stödja doktorand- och masterstudenter i deras forskningsarbete samt hantera administrativ rapportering i system som LADOK
* Aktivt bidra till forskningspublikationer och utveckla nya pedagogiska metoder inom utbildningen.

### **Behörighetskrav**


Behörig att anställas som senior forskningsinfrastrukturspecialist är den som har uppvisat vetenskaplig skicklighet och avlagt doktorsexamen eller har utländsk examen som bedöms motsvara svensk doktorsexamen. Den sökande ska även ha uppvisat teknisk och metodologisk skicklighet samt en god teknisk och metodologisk självständighet där de egna insatserna har varit betydelsefulla. Sökande ska uppvisat dokumenterad bred och djup kompetens inom ett flertal tekniker/metoder med inriktning mot både service och utveckling.

### **Bedömningsgrunder**

***Det är särskilt meriterande att den sökande har uppvisat***

* Doktorsexamen inom ett relevant område som medicinsk teknologi, datavetenskap eller motsvarande, samt med flera års postdoktorala erfarenheter
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att leda och utveckla forskningsinfrastruktur, inklusive hantering av Nvidia DGX-servrar, användning av verktyg som Agilent iLab
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt med betydelsefulla insatser inom flera tekniker och metoder, samt uppvisat bred och djup kompetens inom området
* Erfarenhet av undervisning och kursansvar inom medicinsk teknologi, signalbehandling och AI, samt dokumenterad erfarenhet av handledning av doktorander och masterstudenter
* Goda meriter inom forskning, inklusive publicering av vetenskapliga artiklar och bidrag till utveckling av pedagogiska material
* Behärskar svenska och engelska i tal och skrift

 ***Det är meriterande att den sökande har uppvisat***

* Erfarenhet av DevOps-metodologier och god förståelse för IT-arkitekturer i forskning och kliniskt arbete, samt innovation och samarbete med industriella partners
* Erfarenhet av forsknings- och utbildningsadministration med verktyg som LADOK och Canvas lärplattform
* Erfarenhet av multidisciplinära samarbeten och projekt inom både mjukvara och hårdvara
* Aktivt deltagande i och ledarskap inom EU-projekt, gärna relaterade till AI och digital hälsa
* Erfarenhet av att utbilda och handleda användare, studenter och medarbetare i avancerade tekniker och metoder
* Erfarenhet av att ha deltagit i och erhållit finansiering genom forskningsansökningar
* Deltagande och presentationer vid relevanta konferenser och seminarier


Det är utifrån en sammantagen helhetsbedömning av de sökandes meriter och skicklighet som Karolinska Institutet bedömer vilken av de sökande som har de bästa förutsättningarna att bidra till en positiv utveckling av verksamheten.

### **Vad erbjuder vi?**


En kreativ och inspirerande miljö fylld av kompetens och nyfikenhet. Karolinska Institutet är ett av världens ledande medicinska universitet. Här bedriver vi framgångsrik medicinsk forskning och har det största utbudet av medicinska utbildningar i Sverige. På KI träffar du forskare med olika forskningsinriktningar som jobbar tillsammans. Det är det gränsöverskridande samarbetet som bidrar till KI:s världsledande position inom forskning. Flera av de personer du möter inom vården är utbildade på KI. En nära relationen till hälso- och sjukvården är viktig för att skapa utbildning och forskning av högsta kvalitet. Som universitet är Karolinska Institutet också en statlig myndighet. Det gör att du som anställd får goda förmåner genom vårt kollektivavtal.

**Placering:** Flemingsberg

*Din karriär fortsätter här*

### **Ansökan**


Skicka in den ansökan via Varbi senast den 31 oktober 2024.


Vi ser gärna att din ansökan är skriven på engelska, men det går också bra att ansöka på svenska. Ansökan ska skrivas i enlighet med Karolinska Institutets meritportfölj för forskningsinfrastrukturspecialist/senior forskningsinfrastrukturspecialist (Meritportfölj)

**Vill du göra skillnad – och bidra till en bättre hälsa för alla? Sök jobb hos oss**
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100 % | Ort: Huddinge | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: STÖD 2-3859/2024 | Kontakt: Torkel Brismar 0739-813354, | Facklig företrädare: Henry Wölling, SEKO henry.wolling@ki.se, Carina Eklund, OFR 08-58582665, Taher Darreh-Shori, SACO taher.darreh-shori@ki.se, | Publicerat: 2024-10-16 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-10-31

title: Vi söker dig med lång erfarenhet av DevSecOps!
description:
### **JOB DESCRIPTION**



Är du en erfaren DevSecOps-specialist med en passion för att förbättra och optimera CI/CD-pipelines? Vill du arbeta i en innovativ miljö där du får möjlighet att samarbeta med forsknings- och utvecklingsteam för att driva fram säkerhet, effektivitet och skalbarhet i mjukvaruutveckling? Då kan detta vara något för dig!



**Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden:**



* Utveckla och underhålla en mjukvarufabrik med verktyg som Jenkins, Bitbucket och andra CI/CD-verktyg för att stärka DevSecOps-ekosystemet.
* Arbeta nära R&D-team för att säkerställa att pipelines uppfyller deras krav för driftsättning och testning.
* Skapa och underhålla skript och funktioner för att automatisera bygg-, test- och driftsättningsprocesser.
* Övervaka och felsöka problem i mjukvarufabriken, inklusive byggfel, nätverksanslutning och potentiella flaskhalsar.
* Samarbeta med andra DevOps-teammedlemmar för att förbättra prestanda, säkerhet och skalbarhet i mjukvarufabriken.
* Ständigt utforska nya verktyg och teknologier för att öka effektiviteten och produktiviteten.

### **BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**



För att vara aktuell för denna roll **måste** du ha:


* **Erfarenhet av DevSecOps**: Minst 3 års erfarenhet av att arbeta i DevSecOps-miljöer, inklusive vana vid CI/CD-verktyg som Jenkins, Bitbucket, Artifactory eller liknande.
* **Programmerings- och skriptkompetens**: Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att arbeta med skriptspråk och programmeringsspråk som Bash, Python, Java, Go eller motsvarande.
* **Linux-expertis**: Goda kunskaper i Linux-baserade system och infrastruktur.
* **Erfarenhet av containerisering och orkestrering**: Gedigen erfarenhet av verktyg som Docker, Podman, Kubernetes eller Ansible.
* **Problemlösningsförmåga**: Bevisad förmåga att snabbt identifiera och lösa problem i komplexa miljöer.
* **Kommunikationsförmåga**: Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
* **Säkerhetsprövning:** Då den här tjänsten är inom försvarsindustrin måste du klara av en säkerhetsprövning.


Det är meriterande om du dessutom har:


* **Erfarenhet av säkerhetsaspekter i CI/CD-pipelines**: Kunskap om hur man integrerar säkerhet i DevSecOps-flöden.
* **Certifieringar**: Relevant certifiering inom DevSecOps, Kubernetes, eller andra relaterade teknologier.
* **Erfarenhet av molnplattformar**: Erfarenhet av arbete med molnbaserade lösningar som AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud.
* **Kunskap om automatiseringsverktyg**: Erfarenhet av att arbeta med automatiseringsverktyg som Terraform eller Puppet.
* **Erfarenhet av agila metoder**: Tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta i agila utvecklingsteam, exempelvis enligt Scrum eller Kanban.
* **Erfarenhet av nätverkskonfiguration**: Förståelse för nätverkstopologier och deras påverkan på pipeline-prestanda.

### **PREFERRED ADDITIONAL SKILLS, PERSONAL TRAITS AND EXPERIENCE**



För att trivas och lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har följande personliga egenskaper:


* **Analytisk och lösningsorienterad**: Du har en naturlig förmåga att identifiera problem och hitta kreativa och effektiva lösningar.
* **Strukturerad och noggrann**: Du kan organisera ditt arbete på ett metodiskt sätt och har ett öga för detaljer.
* **Självständig och ansvarstagande**: Du tar egna initiativ och driver arbetet framåt, samtidigt som du tar ansvar för resultatet.
* **Samarbetsvillig och kommunikativ**: Du trivs i team och har lätt för att samarbeta med andra, samtidigt som du kan förklara komplexa tekniska lösningar på ett lättförståeligt sätt.
* **Nyfiken och utvecklingsinriktad**: Du är öppen för att lära dig nya teknologier och har en drivkraft att ständigt förbättra både dina egna färdigheter och teamets arbete.

### **WE OFFER**



Du kommer att bli anställd av oss på Sigma Technology och ingå i ett härligt konsultteam som gör saker tillsammans och har roligt längs vägen! Vi sätter dig som konsult i fokus, det viktigaste för oss är att du som konsult och medarbetare mår bra och har rätt förutsättningar för att utvecklas. Vi tror på långsiktighet och vill därför att du ska trivas hos oss, länge! Nu hoppas vi att du blir en del av oss i Mälardalen och Stockholm! I vårt härliga gäng jobbar vi ute hos våra kunder i roller som systemtekniker, supporttekniker, systemingenjör, IT-projektledare, Service delivery manager, IT-tekniker, applikationsspecialist, och nätverkstekniker, bara för att nämna några.



### **MORE INFORMATION**

  



André Caldegren,  

+46 793511919  

andre.caldegren@sigmatechnology.com



* #### **POSITION**


Vi söker dig med lång erfarenhet av DevSecOps!
* #### **COMPANY**


Sigma Technology IT Infra
* #### **LOCATION**


Stockholm, Västerås, Sweden
* #### **COMPETENCE AREA**


Operation, support and infrastructure
* #### **PUBLICATION DATE**


2024-10-16
* #### **EXPIRATION DATE**


2024-11-14
* #### **CONTACT**


André Caldegren, andre.caldegren@sigmatechnology.com, +46793511919

10 Mountainview Road
Upper Saddle River, NJ 07458

title: Testledare – Kiruna
description:
Modernera är ett modernt rekryterings- och bemanningsföretag. www.modernera.se
  
För en av våra kunders räkning söker vi nu en testledare. Vår kund är ett stabilt och tryggt konsultbolag med stark ekonomi. Företaget erbjuder intressanta uppdrag inom offentlig sektor, med fokus på samhällsnyttiga tillämpningar, och en trygg anställning med kollektivavtal. Företaget har funnits sedan 2003 och består idag av ett 100-tal medarbetare.
  
Du kommer att jobba i trevliga lokaler i centrala Kiruna. Du kommer även ha möjligheten att arbeta hemifrån.
  
  

**Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden kommer att vara:**  

* ledning och koordinering av testarbete
* utarbeta teststrategier och testplaner
* genomföra riskanalyser och ta fram testfall
* säkerställa att testarbetet utförs enligt definierade riktlinjer och standarder
* rapportera och följa upp testresultat
* hantera och lösa eventuella avvikelser och problem som uppstår under testprocessen
* kontinuerligt förbättra testprocessen.


**Krav:**  

* upp till 5 års erfarenhet av att leda testarbeten och testteam
* behärskar svenska språket i tal och skrift


**Meriterande:**  

* god förståelse för testmetoder och processer
* erfarenhet av agila arbetsmetoder och ramverk som ex. Continuous Delivery DevOps, Scrum eller Kanban
* erfarenhet av att arbeta i storskaliga och komplexa tekniska miljöer
* relevant akademisk utbildning inom IT
* har erfarenhet av automatiserat testarbete


**Du får:**  

* stimulerande uppdrag med samhällsnyttiga tillämpningar
* en anställning på ett företag med stabila kundrelationer och samarbeten
* balans i livet där det finns plats för både familj och fritid
* en kompetensresa som är unik för dig och din karriärresa
* en trygg anställning med kollektivavtal och bra förmåner
* en lönemodell som kombinerar anställningstrygghet med rörlig del och vinstdelning
* en platt organisation med närhet till ledning och stor delaktighet


Du kommer att bli anställd hos vår kund. Heltid. Provanställning som övergår i en tillsvidareanställning efter sex månader. Tillträde: omgående.
  
Ansök genom att skicka ditt CV och personligt brev till info@modernera.se. Skriv ”Testledare – Kiruna” i ärenderaden.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
Jobbify är en jobbplattform för vassa kandidater.
  
  

För kunds räkning har vi publicerat denna annons, vill du komma i kontakt med den slutgiltiga arbetsgivaren kan du klicka dig vidare till annonsen:
  
  

We are now looking for a Machine Learning Engineer for our client.
  
  

**Tasks & Responsibilities:**  

Develop AI/ML software products, including, but not limited to, exploring large data sets, trying out new algorithms, feature engineering, testing and evaluating model output, deploying the solution for production usage, and scaling out for a maintainable solution in a comprehensive fashion network.
  
  

Design, develop and maintain the large-scale data infrastructure required for the AI/ML projects.
  
  

Leverage an understanding of software architecture and software design patterns contributing to architectural decisions, and technical roadmap planning, and write scalable, maintainable, well-designed, and future-proof code.
  
  

Develop solutions, components, services, and frameworks to address specific and common needs in AI/ML projects, such as feature reuse, model traceability, monitoring, A/B testing, versioning, release, and serving of both online inference end-points and batch inference.
  
  

Work in a cross-functional agile team of highly skilled engineers, data scientists, and business stakeholders - to build the AI ecosystem within the company.
  
  

**Required Skills & Experience:**  

BSc or MSc degree in computer science, engineering or related field, or equivalent practical experience.
  
  

5+ years’ professional experience working in relevant role(s) for a senior level Machine Learning Engineer.
  
  

Great software engineering skills, a person who loves coding, and likes applying good software engineering practices and DevOps principals to machine learning and AI projects.
  
  

Experience in developing software products that have been successfully deployed to production and scaled in a bigger organization, also ensuring product quality, security and performance.
  
  

Several years of coding experience in modern programming languages, and strong background in Python programming, i.e. 4+ years.
  
  

Great hands-on experience with cloud technologies for ML development, preferably Google Cloud Platform, and also including Vertex AI.
  
  

Solid experience in MLOps practices, developing ML pipelines, data pipelines and deploying ML applications to production.
  
  

Strong working knowledge of a variety of AI/ML techniques and experience working with different frameworks.
  
  

Experience handling and developing for high volume heterogeneous data (both batch and stream), preferably also including hands-on development in DBT, and have also a solid understanding of cloud data storage technologies and data quality.
  
  

Experience from aligning and analyzing requirements; driving design solutions; breaking down work into stories and tasks; supporting and mentoring team members; and making sure organizational standards and best practices are implemented and followed.
  
  

Familiar with agile ways of working, team collaboration, and data-driven development.
  
  

**Required Cloud Certification:**  

GCP Professional Machine Learning Engine
  
  

**Location:** Vasterås
  
  

**Duration:** 2024-11-01 to 2025-03-31
  
  

**Language:** English (Professional level)
  
  

**Remote:** Possible up to 50%
  
  

Interviews are ongoing, we recommend you to apply asap.

Övervaka och felsöka problem i mjukvarufabriken, inklusive byggfel, nätverksanslutning och potentiella flaskhalsar.
  
Samarbeta med andra DevOps-teammedlemmar för att förbättra prestanda, säkerhet och skalbarhet i mjukvarufabriken.
  
Ständigt utforska nya verktyg och teknologier för att öka effektiviteten och produktiviteten.
  
  

Baskunskaper
  
  

**För att vara aktuell för denna roll måste du ha:**  

**Erfarenhet av DevSecOps:** Minst 3 års erfarenhet av att arbeta i DevSecOps-miljöer, inklusive vana vid CI/CD-verktyg som Jenkins, Bitbucket, Artifactory eller liknande.
  
**Programmerings- och skriptkompetens:** Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att arbeta med skriptspråk och programmeringsspråk som Bash, Python, Java, Go eller motsvarande.
  
**Linux-expertis:** Goda kunskaper i Linux-baserade system och infrastruktur.
  
**Erfarenhet av containerisering och orkestrering:** Gedigen erfarenhet av verktyg som Docker, Podman, Kubernetes eller Ansible.
  
**Problemlösningsförmåga:** Bevisad förmåga att snabbt identifiera och lösa problem i komplexa miljöer.
  
**Kommunikationsförmåga:** Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
  
**Säkerhetsprövning:** Då den här tjänsten är inom försvarsindustrin måste du klara av en säkerhetsprövning.
  
  

**Det är meriterande om du dessutom har:**  

**Erfarenhet av säkerhetsaspekter i CI/CD-pipelines:** Kunskap om hur man integrerar säkerhet i DevSecOps-flöden.
  
**Certifieringar:** Relevant certifiering inom DevSecOps, Kubernetes, eller andra relaterade teknologier.
  
**Erfarenhet av molnplattformar:** Erfarenhet av arbete med molnbaserade lösningar som AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud.
  
**Kunskap om automatiseringsverktyg:** Erfarenhet av att arbeta med automatiseringsverktyg som Terraform eller Puppet.
  
**Erfarenhet av agila metoder:** Tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta i agila utvecklingsteam, exempelvis enligt Scrum eller Kanban.
  
**Erfarenhet av nätverkskonfiguration:** Förståelse för nätverkstopologier och deras påverkan på pipeline-prestanda.
  
  

Personliga färdigheter, egenskaper, erfarenhet
  
För att trivas och lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har följande personliga egenskaper:
  
**Analytisk och lösningsorienterad:** Du har en naturlig förmåga att identifiera problem och hitta kreativa och effektiva lösningar.
  
**Strukturerad och noggrann:** Du kan organisera ditt arbete på ett metodiskt sätt och har ett öga för detaljer.
  
**Självständig och ansvarstagande:** Du tar egna initiativ och driver arbetet framåt, samtidigt som du tar ansvar för resultatet.
  
**Samarbetsvillig och kommunikativ:** Du trivs i team och har lätt för att samarbeta med andra, samtidigt som du kan förklara komplexa tekniska lösningar på ett lättförståeligt sätt.
  
**Nyfiken och utvecklingsinriktad:** Du är öppen för att lära dig nya teknologier och har en drivkraft att ständigt förbättra både dina egna färdigheter och teamets arbete.
  
  

Vi erbjuder
  
Du kommer att bli anställd av oss på Sigma Technology och ingå i ett härligt konsultteam som gör saker tillsammans och har roligt längs vägen! Vi sätter dig som konsult i fokus, det viktigaste för oss är att du som konsult och medarbetare mår bra och har rätt förutsättningar för att utvecklas. Vi tror på långsiktighet och vill därför att du ska trivas hos oss, länge! Nu hoppas vi att du blir en del av oss i Mälardalen och Stockholm! I vårt härliga gäng jobbar vi ute hos våra kunder i roller som systemtekniker, supporttekniker, systemingenjör, IT-projektledare, Service delivery manager, IT-tekniker, applikationsspecialist, och nätverkstekniker, bara för att nämna några.

title: DBA Db2 Unix/Linux Administrator, Sundsvall
description:

Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our DBA Db2 Unix/Linux Administrator, Sundsvall
  
  

**About VIPAS :**  

Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
  
  

**Job Description:**  

We are seeking two IT technicians level 3, each at 100% of a full-time position. One of the full-time positions is currently available. Proficiency in Swedish is mandatory for this position.
  
The consultant will be on-site at the Försäkringskassan offices in Sundsvall for approximately two weeks for the project initiation. After that, the assignment can be performed remotely upon agreement. Parts of the assignment may need to be carried out in Sundsvall, approximately once a month.
  
The assignment involves designing, implementing, operating, and maintaining Db2 databases. The consultant will be part of a database team and perform tasks as a resource in development teams in one or more parallel projects. On-call duty may be included in the assignment.
  
**Location:** Sundsvall (Remote work is OK)
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

The offered consultant must meet the following skills and experience requirements. It is important that the consultant has current knowledge, so each skill and experience listed below must have been at least partially acquired within the last 7 years.
  
  

The offered consultant must have skills in database management and database design, as well as a good understanding of performance implications.
  
  

The offered consultant must have at least 3 years of experience as a DBA in relational databases on Unix/Linux platforms.
  
  

The offered consultant must have at least 2 years of experience designing logical and physical databases using Power Designer or equivalent.
  
  

**Requirements:**  

Experience as a DBA in Db2 on Unix/Linux platforms.
  
  

Security Clearance
  
The assignment requires that the offered consultant undergoes a security clearance. The consultant may not start the assignment before the security clearance is approved.
  
  

Why Join Us?

title: Data Platform Engineer
description:
At Kivra, we are building services that connect 6 million people, by providing a safe and accessible digital infrastructure that everyone in Sweden can trust and use. At the same time, we are saving trees - reducing the paper that is printed and transported - by providing a better digital alternative to physical paper communication.

#### **Why are we looking for a Data Platform Engineer?**


We have a modern, cloud-based data platform, which you will build upon and improve with other engineers in the team. As part of the vision of the Data Platform and Engineering Team at Kivra, we are developing an internal platform for analysts and engineers to improve the ease and experience of working with data across the organization.

##### **What you’ll do**

* Build and maintain an internal development platform for data tools, services, and workflows
	+ Standardize configurations and workflows
	+ Automate redundant tasks
	+ Ensure compliance (e.g. GDPR) and security across all golden paths
* Adopt a “platform as a product” approach, treating analysts and engineers as our customers; aim to improve the analyst and engineering experience working with data tools and services, and remove complexity and cognitive load of our customers
* Use your knowledge and expertise to work with data stakeholders to make data easily accessible and available to product and functional teams in Kivra (this data is used for, amongst others, business intelligence, analytics, reporting and billing). We are responsible for a number of data products and services which we provide to the rest of the organization (e.g. APIs and data integrations)
* As a team, we have full ownership and autonomy over what and how we build our solutions - from idea and design, to implementation and operations. We are responsible for our solutions end-to-end

##### **Who you are**


You want to join a fun, diverse and friendly team. You are a team player who wants to build good relationships with your colleagues to understand their problems and challenges. You embrace “platform thinking” in your work - and strive to enable and support your colleagues, not block them. You are proactive, entrepreneurial and want to shape this role based on the opportunities you discover. You are curious, collaborative and like solving problems.

**Furthermore we think that you:**

* Are easy-going, open and bring positive energy to your work and colleagues
* Have at least 4 years of full-time software engineering experience and an interest in platform engineering
* Have experience working with Infrastructure DevOps - automation, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), version control, containerization, and CI/CD (we use Terraform, GitHub, Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions)
* Have experience working in a cloud platform - GCP, Azure, or AWS (we use GCP)
* Are familiar with Python
* Are already familiar with, or want to work in the data engineering space (and associated tooling, e.g. Airflow and dbt)

 **And it would be a bonus if you:**

* Are familiar with Google Cloud Platform and the tooling there
* Have experience with data engineering and data tooling - e.g. Airflow, dbt, cloud data warehouses

##### **Additional information**

* The role is full-time and our offices are based in Stockholm.
* The Data Platform and Engineering Team has a hybrid work location policy - in practice this means most of the team is in the office ~2 days a week, and come into the office as required for certain workshops or important meetings/discussions.
* You will be part of the Data Platform and Engineering Team and report to the manager of the Data Platform and Engineering Team.
* Fluency in English is required and fluency in Swedish is a plus but not required.
* We are unfortunately not able to sponsor new work permits, but are able to sponsor/renew existing work permits.

#### **We offer**


Kivra offers a role in a caring and committed team, in a company that is growing and continuously innovating. You’ll join a warm and friendly culture that thrives on collaboration and teamwork. You will be involved in shaping and influencing a product currently used by more than half of Sweden’s population.


We offer competitive remuneration and great benefits. We offer a hybrid way of working where working from home is of course accepted, however you are always welcome to join us in our vibrant office located in central Stockholm.

#### **How to apply**


Easy peasy, just send in your CV and cover letter as soon as possible. If you have any questions regarding the role or the recruitment process don’t hesitate to contact Sarah Ohlsson, Talent Acquisition Partner at sarah.ohlsson@kivra.com.

title: Platform Engineer
description:
**Do you want to help us build our best-in-class and simply awesome SaaS product?**


We are a fast-paced product company who are revolutionizing the Ad Tech industry, thanks to our cutting-edge technology and focus on excellence and scale.

  

Our agile teams are highly autonomous, collaborative and we are now looking for yet another passionate engineer to join us!

**Ready for a new challenge? Here is what we offer.**

* **Flexible & autonomous teams, built upon trust.**  

Together we decide how to win. We trust and respect the individual. We believe in close collaboration and communication, within and outside of the team.
  
* **New challenges and personal growth.**  

We live by our entrepreneurial spirit, this means taking risks, identifying opportunities and always seeking new solutions.
  
* **A passionate and fun culture.**  

We are passionate about our work and believe that having lots of fun is essential for both creativity and success. Welcome to a diverse and inclusive workplace, with a lot of fun and exciting activities going on including hackathons, team activities, company trips and board game nights.
  
* **A stable and global industry-leader based in Stockholm**.  

Our finances are in excellent shape, our international customer base is constantly growing and so is our product.
  
* **Constantly evolving tech and modern tooling.**  

We are constantly looking to improve our product and tech. Do you have ideas how we can scale even faster? Bring them on!

**Are you + Bannerflow = true?**


We are looking for a Platform Engineer who will keep our platform and infrastructure secure, stable and future-proof as we scale to new markets. As a Platform Engineer, you will not only build cool solutions together with our Platform team and Chief Architect, you will also work side by side with other product teams; educating, guiding, collecting feedback and removing bottlenecks from our development teams.

 **So, what are we looking for?**


A senior Platform Engineer with experience planning, designing, and implementing DevOps processes, strategies, and tooling to remove hurdles and pains from product development life cycles. You’ll need a strong sense of ownership, personal drive, and the ability to write clean, efficient, and well-documented code. You are interested in keeping up with best practices and likes to continually improve our product and processes. We believe you are an excellent communicator that thrives in a highly collaborative environment.


In addition to these traits, we’re looking for expertise in,

* Docker and Linux
* Proficiency in working with cloud providers—with a preference for Azure.
* Deep knowledge of AKS/Kubernetes
* Experience managing private networking, load balancers, and firewalls.
* Familiarity with modern CI/CD tools, such as GitHub Actions experience as well as DSLs, like Terraform or Bicep.


We believe that our employees are the key to our success and we are dedicated to building a positive and supportive work environment where our employees can thrive and grow. We are committed to building a diverse and inclusive team and welcome applications from candidates of all backgrounds, experiences, and abilities.

  

If you are ready to take your career to the next level, we want to hear from you!

title: Cloud, MLOps and DevOps Architect (Principal Researcher)
description:
**Grow with us**
----------------



About this opportunity

  

Ericsson is a world-leading provider of telecommunications equipment and services to mobile and fixed network operators. Over 1,000 networks in more than 180 countries use Ericsson equipment, and more than 40 percent of the world's mobile traffic passes through Ericsson networks. Using innovation to empower people, business and society, Ericsson is working towards the Networked Society: a world connected in real time that will open opportunities to create freedom, transform society and drive solutions to some of our planet’s greatest challenges.

  

  

Ericsson's 6G vision, first introduced in 2020, remains pivotal for transforming business and society in the 2030s through secure, efficient, and sustainable communication services. As 6G development progresses into a more concrete phase of regulation and standardization we are looking for researchers that would like to join us, co-creating a cyber-physical world.

  

Within Ericsson, Ericsson Research develops new communication solutions and standards which have made Ericsson the industry leader in defining five generations of mobile communication. As we gear up for the 6th generation, we would like to fully embrace and utilize cloud native principles, hyperscalers and internal cloud infrastructure in our research. We are now looking for a cloud tech lead to develop and drive our workflows.

**Join our Team**
-----------------



In this role, you will

* Lead the direction and trajectory of cloud-native ways of working at Ericsson Research and drive adoption
* Research, design and develop workflows and solutions for AI based R&D
* Develop and support pipelines, testing, and distributed infrastructure to enable HW-accelerated work
* Drive work on solutions for efficient use of internal and external cloud compute platforms
* Provide technical insights on investments in future compute decisions.

  

Qualifications

* PhD or M.Sc. in Data Science or related field, or equivalent practical experience
* Technical leadership experience combined with a substantial professional experience is required, particularly in:


o Programming in various languages (Python, Go, Julia, Java, JS etc.)  

o Containers technologies (engines, orchestration tools and frameworks such as Docker, Kaniko, Kubernetes, Helm, etc.)  

o Cloud ecosystems along with the respective infrastructure, in particular AWS  

o Infrastructure management (Ansible, Terraform, etc.)  

o DevOps and CI/CD experience, runner deployment & management, pipeline creation, etc.  

o ML frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow, or Jax)  

o Dispatching and computational Python packages (Hydra, numpy, TensorFlow, etc.)  

o MLOps technologies and tooling (e.g. MLFlow, Kubeflow)  

* Team skills is a necessity. Daily cross-functional collaboration and interaction with other skilled researchers are the basis for our ways of working.
* You should enjoy working with people having diverse backgrounds and competences.
* It is important that you have strong personal drive and a strong focus on the tasks at hand.
* Ability to translate high-level objectives into detailed tasks and actionable steps.
* Experience in and ability to conduct research is meritorious.
  

Primary location Luleå but other locations in Sweden might also be possible.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Är du en erfaren DevOps-ingenjör med intresse för teknik och att ständigt utvecklas? Vill du hjälpa våra kunder att göra världen lite bättre? Då kan du vara den vi söker.
   

  

 HiQ är utan tvekan ett av Sveriges mest tekniktunga och spännande konsultbolag med kunder inom en rad olika branscher såsom exempelvis fordon, fintech, myndigheter, medtech och telekom. Förutom att vi bidragit till utvecklingen av att snart bli ett kontantlöst samhälle, utvecklar vi även allt från digitaliseringen av elkraftsystem till framtidens autonoma fordon. Enkelt sagt, vi gillar att skapa sådant som förenklar och gör vardagen lite roligare för oss alla.
   

  

 Rollen som DevOps-ingenjör hos oss är en omväxlande roll, med arbete på olika nivåer, där du får en chans att delta i våra kunders DevOps-resa utifrån deras mognadsgrad.
   

  

**Matchar vi?**
 Vi söker dig som blir uttråkad av att göra samma sak två gånger och genast börjar hacka ihop en automatiserad lösning istället. Vi ser gärna att du har automatiserat något som absolut inte behövdes automatiseras! Kanske hemma?
   

  

 De som jobbar med DevOps på HiQ har ofta en kodtung utbildning och har jobbat som DevOps engineer i några år. Vi ser gärna att du har en liknande bakgrund, då vi oftast tar oss an Stockholms mer avancerade uppdrag.
   

  

**Checklist**
* Högskole-/Universitetsexamen inom datateknik, datavetenskap, systemvetenskap eller annan relevant inriktning
* Minst 3 års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet
* Flytande i svenska och engelska


 Det är ett stort plus om du har tidigare erfarenhet av:
   

  

* Scripting
* Säkerhet
* Monitorering
* CI/CD-tekniker
* Containeriseringsverktyg och molnlösningar
* Automation i produktionsmiljö med många noder
* IP-nätverk, VPN, DNS, lastbalanserare och brandväggar
* Seamless/automatiserade byggscript för release management i olika miljöer


 Vi ser också gärna att du tidigare byggt sofistikerad infrastruktur med en hög grad av automation och är en förespråkare av infrastructure-as-code.

 Meriterande kunskaper:

 Som konsult hos Liminity får du tillgång till marknadens bästa villkor och förmåner, inklusive:

title: Data Engineer - AWS, Redshift, Python & SQL
description:
**About Us**
 Sinch is a global leader in cloud communications, helping businesses connect with their customers on mobile phones. We facilitate over 147 billion conversations annually, reaching every phone on Earth. Our technology powers the world's leading communication platforms.
   

  

 We are a dynamic and innovative team seeking a passionate Data Engineer to collaborate on our data pipeline and data warehousing solutions.
   

  

 The working model is hybrid, and you can work from our Stockholm or Malmo office.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain scalable, resilient data pipelines using AWS services such as Lambda, Step Functions, Redshift, and S3.
* Improve and maintain the Redshift data warehouse solution.
* Manage the data lifecycle from ingestion and processing to storage and retrieval.
* Work with a range of different technologies and programming languages, with a primary focus on Python and SQL.
* Actively contribute to enhancing our data processes and pipelines.
* Take a hands-on approach to monitoring production environments, identifying issues, and being on-call when necessary.
* Engage closely with data scientists, software engineers, architects, DevOps specialists, and product managers to deliver exceptional data solutions.
* Build and maintain visualizations and dashboards in Tableau.


**Requirements**
* Capable of developing, maintaining, and optimizing data pipelines for enhanced performance and reliability.
* Experienced professional in team-based software development and deployment.
* Skilled in using SQL for data querying and ETL/ELT development.
* Experienced in data warehousing (Redshift) and data modelling.
* In-depth knowledge of AWS services including Lambda, Step Functions, Redshift, and S3.
* Ability to work effectively within a cross-functional self-organizing team, fostering collaboration and mutual respect among team members.
* A passion for writing clean and efficient code.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills in English.
* Bachelor's degree in computer science, data engineering, or related technical discipline.


 Good to have
   

  

* Knowledgeable about various data architectures such as Data Lake, Data Mesh, and Data Fabric.
* Experience in data visualization tools.
* Knowledge in or willing to learn infrastructure as code using Terraform.
* Experience in a similar industry or related one.
* Proven ability to work with others to solve tough technical problems.
* Ability to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced work environment characteristic of agile development methodologies.
* Experience guiding and mentoring fellow engineers, empowering them to contribute effectively to team goals.


 Embrace the challenge and join us!

title: Site Reliability Engineer - Cloud Enablement
company_industry: Software Development, Computer and Network Security, and Information Technology & Services
description:
Flexera saves customers billions of dollars in wasted technology spend. A pioneer in Hybrid ITAM and FinOps, Flexera provides award-winning, data-oriented SaaS solutions for technology value optimization (TVO), enabling IT, finance, procurement and cloud teams to gain deep insights into cost optimization, compliance and risks for each business service. Flexera One solutions are built on a set of definitive customer, supplier and industry data, powered by our Technology Intelligence Platform, that enables organizations to visualize their Enterprise Technology Blueprint™ in hybrid environments—from on-premises to SaaS to containers to cloud.
   

  

 We’re transforming the software industry.  We’re Flexera.  With
 **more than 50,000 customers** 
 across the world, we’re achieving that goal. But we know we can’t do any of that without our team. Ready to help us re-imagine the industry during a time of substantial growth and ambitious plans?  Come and see why
 **we’re consistently recognized by Gartner, Forrester and IDC** 
 as a category leader in the marketplace. Learn more at
 **flexera.com**
**About Us**
 We're a fast-growing, category-leading organization with ambitious objectives and a positive, inclusive culture. We're looking for passionate professionals who want to grow their talents and achieve great things. If that sounds like you, we want to talk to you about joining our team.
   

  

 The Cloud Enablement team is responsible for accelerating the delivery and improving the operation of our cloud-based software by providing and supporting tools and patterns which reduce the cognitive load on our development teams. We free up our developers to focus on solving problems for our customers rather than spending time on extraneous tasks. Drawing on the shared experience and expertise from our organization and industry; we create, support and evolve the paved path for teams to build, deploy and run secure and reliable software.
   

  

**What will you do?**
* Design, build, advocate for and support the common tools and delivery platform used by Flexera developers.
* Improve developer experience and operational excellence.
* Foster collaboration and knowledge sharing across Flexera.
* Select and rollout supported defaults and standards for CI/CD tooling, Observability, Security and Runtime Environment.
* Work with teams across several continents, build relationships with our engineers by listening and understanding their needs and balancing this with the needs of our business.
* Research new tools and patterns and continuously measure and evolve our ways of doing things.
* Cloud Cost Optimization uses a combination of strategies, techniques, best practices and tools to help manage/reduce cloud costs.


**You have**
* Developer/DevOps/SRE/Platform experience and a strong interest in software delivery and ongoing operation.
* Worked on rolling out automation, tools, technologies, patterns and guardrails across an organization or teams.
* Experience working in a globally distributed team.
* Extensive public cloud (preferably AWS) knowledge & experience.
* Deep knowledge of containers (Docker) orchestration (Kubernetes).
* Knowledge of tools and patterns around CI/CD (familiar with Travis CI, Circle CI, Buildkite or similar).
* Observability knowledge; Logs, Tracing, Metrics and experience in a few of Elastic Stack, XRay, Jaeger, Zipkin, Prometheus, Honeycomb or LightStep. Enterprise observability tools such as NewRelic, DataDog etc.
* Cloud cost optimization; Using automation to keep Cloud cost under control and within budget. Enabling individual Engineering teams with cloud cost optimization.
* Knowledge of operations, including incident management, immutable infrastructure as code (esp. Terraform or CloudFormation), and problem-solving.
* Produced robust well-tested code preferably in Golang; however, we will also consider Python, JavaScript, Ruby, Java or C# if you are happy to learn Go.
* Excellent communication skills, including experience in writing good documentation and running workshops.


**Critical Skills / Competencies**
* Agile software delivery methodologies
* Experience managing cloud-based services e.g. AWS, Azure at scale
* Experience with DevOps
* Experience with docker Containers, Kubernetes, EKS, ECS
* Infrastructure as code e.g. Terraform, CloudFormation
* CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, travisCI, teamcity, pipeline as code
* Automation / Configuration Management at scale e.g. Puppet, Chef, Ansible, Salt, Packer etc.
* Service mesh such as Istio, Consul or similar
* Expertise in one or more of the following languages: Python / Go / Java / C# / C / C++
* Experience with IaaS and Serverless services from a cloud provider
* A strong understanding in TCP/IP, DNS and experience designing networks
* Linux & Windows system administration experience
* Experience implementing fault detection, and automating fixes
* Experience designing scalable services
* Experience designing distributed, fault-tolerant systems
* A good understanding of SQL, No-SQL databases
* A solid understanding of data structures and algorithms
* A positive attitude and willingness to learn
* Strong conflict resolution competence
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Detail oriented. The ideal candidate is one who naturally digs as deep as they need to understand the why


**Minimum Qualifications**
* Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
* At least 3 years of hands-on job experience managing services in a public cloud
* At least 1 year of experience working as a member of a centralized Cloud enablement / Platform or a similar team


**Bonus Skills**
 The following list of items are not pre-requisites for the role but might give you a bit more of an idea about what you may expect to come across in your SRE role at Flexera:
   

  

* Python / Golang / Java / C# / C / C++ / Bash experience
* Big Data, Machine Learning, AI (DataBricks, Snowflake etc.) Platforms
* Experience with Monitoring systems such as New Relic, ELK, Prometheus, Datadog, X-ray etc.
* Security background
* SQL, NOSQL and Graph databases
* Relevant Certification e.g. AWS, GCP, Azure
* Experience of Disciplined Agile Delivery (DAD)


**#Development**
 Flexera is proud to be an equal opportunity employer.  Qualified applicants will be considered for open roles regardless of age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by local/national laws, policies and/or regulations.
   

  

 Flexera understands the value that results from employing a diverse, equitable, and inclusive workforce. We recognize that equity necessitates acknowledging past exclusion and that inclusion requires intentional effort. Our DEI (Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion) council is the driving force behind our commitment to championing policies and practices that foster a welcoming environment for all.
   

  

 We encourage candidates requiring accommodations to please let us know by emailing careers@flexera.com.

title: Dev Ops engineer for MQ platform at Hosting & Integration| SEB, Solna
HEAD OF IT SECURITY
description:
**Head of IT Security**
 As the Head of IT Security at SAS you will be responsible for our IT security & compliance department. It is a leader role that is expected to drive the overall IT security agenda, working closely with the members of the Digital & IT leadership team. Our view is that the Head of IT security needs to collaborate deeply with the other departments, setting requirements and policies but also ensuring that the teams get the practical support they need to keep our environment secure together with the IT security resources.
   

  

 You will play a key role in driving and implementing security best practices, managing the 24/7 security operations center and ensuring that we are compliant to the relevant security standards.
   

  

**About The Team**
 Digital & IT is the organization responsible for all development, maintenance and operations of applications and technology services within SAS. The setup is a mix between in-house development, COTS products and SaaS solutions. A key focus is also on how we are a good partner to our colleagues around SAS on technology related topics
   

  

**Challenges You Will Work On**
* Managing our overall cyber security strategy and governance framework covering both traditional ITIL based service delivery and modern DevOps ways of working
* Ensure an efficient risk management framework to ensure that SAS understands their cyber security/ IT risks and work to make it a natural part of our daily business
* Manage the central security team and ensure that the teams across digital & IT get the support and knowledge they need to develop and operate secure solutions
* Continuously improve and evolve our 24/7 security operations center to ensure that we can act on the threats towards our environment
* Be responsible and evolve the CSMS to ensure that we are compliant with the different regulations (NIS2, Part-IS etc.)
* Be an advocate of Security in the organization, creating community around security topics and adopting security best practices across the organization.
* Collaborate on topics related to disaster recovery, threat modeling exercises, and other security-related activities across the organization


**To Be Successful, We Believe You Have**
* Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or relevant experience.
* Proven experience (min. 10 years) in IT security roles, with a strong understanding of cybersecurity principles, protocols, and technologies.
* Leadership experience
* Experience with security tools and technologies, such as SIEM solutions, endpoint protection platforms, identity and access management systems, and network security appliances.
* Hands-on experience with cloud security practices, cloud well architected framework, and security best practices used in cloud environments.
* Knowledge of relevant regulatory frameworks like NIS2, Part-IS GDPR and industry standards (e.g., NIST, ISO 27001/2) and what it takes to comply.
* Effective communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
* Strong problem-solving abilities, pro-active, data-driven mindset to identify the areas
* Drive initiatives in collaboration with the team members, other security representatives and stakeholders.
* A team player, positive attitude, helping and coaching team members.
* Passionate about IT security and thrive on the dynamic challenges posed by the ever-evolving cyber threat landscape.


**Is this you? If so, come fly with us!**
 Please send your CV as soon as possible. Interviews are conducted continuously, and the position may be filled before the application deadline (2024-10-28). We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

**Why SAS?**
**Benefits**
 At SAS, we offer extensive opportunities for professional development in an international, fast-paced working environment. We are dedicated to the continuous growth of our employees. Working with us comes with a variety of benefits, including:
   

  

* Travel Perks: Enjoy discounted travel opportunities around the world with SAS.
* Health & Wellness: Access to health and wellness benefits, including a newly renovated gym with complimentary classes such as CrossFit and yoga.
* Discounts: Receive discounts from a wide range of brands, as well as on transportation to and from airports, airport shops, hotels, and car rentals.
* Work Environment: Our office location in Frösundavik offers a vibrant workspace with a restaurant, café, and easy access to outdoor activities in Hagaparken and Brunnsviken. Engage in running, tennis, outdoor gym sessions, kayaking, and stand-up paddling with equipment available free of charge.
* Convenient Commute: Benefit from a non-stop bus service connecting our office to Central Station, Solna station, and commuter trains, alongside a network of cycle paths.

title: Senior Infrastructure Cloud Architect, Professional Services
description:
**Description**
 As a Senior Cloud Infrastructure Architect, you will contribute with presales and led complex projects as a Delivery Technical Leader, often involving multiple Amazon and customer teams. You will lead and enable them by applying Amazon Day 1 culture and developing technical expertise to deliver solutions tailored to their business needs.
   

  

 You will work with customers and partners supporting them through planning, prioritization and delivery of complex transformation initiatives, while collaborating with relevant Sales and Service Teams. You will help create and apply frameworks, methods, best practices and artifacts that deliver prescriptive guidance to customers, and publish and present them in large forums and across various media platforms. You will provide guidance regarding customers’ technical architecture and investments, maximizing alignment with the AWS platform, and ease of adoption as new services and products become available. You will work towards customer business outcomes, ensuring there is a strong connection between delivery activities and business objectives.
   

  

 Do you have experience leading and delivering large IT solutions in agile environment - plan, organize, and manage all phases of a project lifecycle to ensure successful delivery on a scale?
   

  

 Come build the future with us.
   

  

**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 Amazon values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship and Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Multiple years of IT implementation experience in customer-facing roles
* Track record as technical leader driving engagements and guiding customer investment decisions
* Experience driving discussions with senior personnel regarding trade-offs, best practices, project management and risk mitigation
* Experience driving presales with senior customer stakeholders in collaboration with internal teams
* Hands-on programming/scripting experience to drive the design, development and deployment of business software infrastructure at scale


**Preferred Qualifications**
* BS level technical degree with Computer Science or Math background
* Proven track record of implementing AWS services in large scale cloud migrations and highly available and fault-tolerant enterprise software deployments
* Experience with IT compliance and risk management requirements (e.g., security, privacy, SOX, ISO, HIPAA etc.)
* AWS Certifications, e.g., AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch)
   

  

 Job ID: A2806530
